movie.beginning:
CARS 2
WRITTEN BY
BEN QUEEN
A sleek British sports car talks directly to us in a pixilated, garbled video. He's OUT OF BREATH. Crates are visible behind him. We're in the shadowy bowels of a steel room.
LELAND TURBO This is Agent Leland Turbo. I have a flash transmission for Agent Finn McMissile.
SUPERIMPOSE OVER BLACK: WALT DISNEY PICTURES PRESENTS
LELAND TURBO Finn. My cover's been compromised. Everything's gone pear-shaped.
SUPERIMPOSE OVER BLACK: A PIXAR ANIMATION STUDIOS FILM
LELAND TURBO You won't believe what I've found out here.
He angles our camera view, reveals a PORTHOLE through which we can see flames rising in the distance.
LELAND TURBO This is bigger than anything we've ever seen. And no one even knows it exists. Finn, I need backup. But don't call the cavalry - it could blow the operation. And be careful. It's not safe out here!
ANGRY VOICES O.S. Time for Turbo to go.
LELAND TURBO Transmitting my grids now. Good luck!
Coordinates appear: 40 6.80' N - 172 23.84' W
TITLE CARD: CARS 2

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SOMEWHERE IN THE NORTH PACIFIC - NIGHT
scene.meta: A TINY CRAB BOAT (CRABBY) crests over massive swells.

char.name: CRABBY
char.dialogue: Alright buddy, we're here. Right where you paid me to bring you. Question is, why?

scene.meta: A metallic blue sports car, circa the `60s, emerges from the 2. shadows. Cagey, smooth, he'd turn heads driving through any intersection in the world. Meet FINN MCMISSILE.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: I'm looking for a car.

char.name: CRABBY
char.dialogue: A car? Hey pal, you can't get any further away from land than out here.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Exactly where I want to be.

char.name: CRABBY
char.dialogue: Well I got news for you, buddy. There's nobody out here but us.

scene.meta: Suddenly, a HORN -- a COMBAT SHIP, the size of most cruise ships. FINN quickly backs into the shadows, out of sight.

char.name: COMBAT SHIP
char.dialogue: What are you doing out here?

char.name: CRABBY
char.dialogue: What does it look like, genius? I'm crabbing!

char.name: COMBAT SHIP
char.dialogue: Well turn around and go back where you came from.

char.name: CRABBY
char.dialogue: Yeah? And who's gonna make me?

scene.meta: A laser sight hits Crabby between the eyes.

char.name: CRABBY
char.dialogue: Alright, alright! Don't get your prop in a twist. What a jerk. Sorry, buddy. Looks like it's the end of the line. Buddy?

scene.meta: (as he turns to leave) ON CRABBY'S DECK: Finn is gone. CUT TO: FINN - He HANGS off the side of COMBAT SHIP, clandestine. We're with Finn as the ship continues on, cuts through the darkness with purpose. Suddenly small flames appear, perhaps a knot or so away. Then WHOOSH!!! A flame rises above Finn, the ship. It illuminates an OIL DERRICK. 3. THWAP! Finn fires a GRAPPLING HOOK to the derrick and SWINGS toward it. He's going to SLAM into the side with brute force

scene.sceneheader: EXT. PLATFORM - OIL DERRICK - MOMENTS LATER
scene.meta: Finn approaches a loading bay from above, hides. He watches as GREMLINS, PACERS and assorted other cars scurry about.

char.name: FINN (INTO RADIO)
char.dialogue: Leland Turbo, this is Finn McMissile. I'm at the rally point. Over.

scene.meta: No response.

char.name: FINN (INTO RADIO)
char.dialogue: Leland, it's Finn. Please respond. Over.

scene.meta: AN ACCESS DOOR OPENS LOUDLY below. A boxy, monacle-wearing German car enters. This is PROFESSOR OTTO ZUNDAPP.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Too many cars here. Out of my way!

scene.meta: (in German and English)

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Professor Zundapp?

char.name: PACER (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Here it is, Professor.

scene.meta: Zundapp approaches a NOSY PACER who idles next to a CRATE.

char.name: NOSY PACER
char.dialogue: You wanted to see this before we load it?

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Ah, yes. Very carefully...

scene.meta: A forklift opens the crate -- inside is a TV CAMERA, packed carefully in foam. Finn SNAPS PHOTOS FURIOUSLY.

char.name: NOSY PACER
char.dialogue: Oh. A TV camera. What does it actually do? 4.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: This camera is extremely dangerous.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: What are you up to now, Professor?

scene.meta: (TO HIMSELF) Finn, angling for a better view, FIRES SUSPENSION WIRES --- --- which sail clear to the other side of the derrick --- --- THOK! They hook tightly onto a steel girder. Finn slides out ONTO THE WIRE like an acrobat, then expels another cross-wire for support.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: This is valuable equipment. Make sure it is properly secured for the voyage.

char.name: NOSY PACER
char.dialogue: You got it.

scene.meta: Finn LOWERS HIMSELF. He snaps more pictures.

char.name: GREM (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Hey, Professor Z!

scene.meta: Zundapp turns as a CRANE LOWERS A CAR-SIZED CRATE. GREM and ACER, an orange Gremlin and a green Pacer, flank it.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: This is one of those British spies we told you about.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: Yeah. This one we caught sticking his bumper where it didn't belong.

scene.meta: Finn PRODUCES SEMI-AUTOMATIC GUNS from his side, readies himself for a tag-team spy fight with his buddy Leland.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Agent Leland Turbo.

scene.meta: The crate is lifted, revealing a CRUSHED, CUBED Leland Turbo. Finn's eyes go wide. Suddenly --- WHOOOSHHH! Another derrick flame rises behind him, casts a Finn-shaped SHADOW over the Professor. He looks up. 5.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: It's Finn McMissile! He's seen the camera! Kill him!!

scene.meta: Finn UNLOADS with bullets as he starts to retreat --- He STOPS: BAD GUY CARS are waiting for him on the catwalk where he just came from - BLOWTORCHES ready. Finn, stuck in midair, notices an angry CRANE. Finn GRINS, having just found his escape. THWAPTHWAPTHWAP!!! Finn releases three of his four cables, swinging, Indiana Jones-style on the last one TOWARD THE

--- where he lands on its BOOM, drives UP and LAUNCHES OFF IT where he LANDS - MOVING - onto another deck! Finn now DRIVES, spraying oil and screeching around corners. A GREMLIN in pursuit hits the oil patch, loses control --- --- and PLUMMETS OFF the side of the rig! The Gremlin FALLS... it's like an eternity... He smashes into the water and breaks into a million pieces. ON FINN - Now set upon by 20 or 30 MORE pursuing cars. He has nowhere to go but UP UP UP a ramp toward the helipad. He spies some GASOLINE BARRELS, fires a SINGLE BULLET which cuts through its leather straps, sending barrels DOWN the ramp,

--- PAST the pursuing CARS --- --- to the bottom where they EXPLODE in a CHAIN REACTION back UP THE RAMP, taking out at least 15 CARS! ON THE HELIPAD - Finn blasts into view, pulls to a stop. No more road. Nowhere else to go. The 20 BAD GUY CARS that are still in pursuit surround him, fire up their blowtorches. About to pounce. Finn GRINS. The second time we've seen this grin. It means he's got something cooking. Finn's REVERSE LIGHTS appear. He DRIVES BACKWARD off the edge of the helipad to the SHOCK of the other cars. Finn falls. He turns himself so he's grill first, cleanly cutting into the water. 6. He EMERGES, now sprouting HYDROFOIL and speeds away.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Get to the boats.

scene.meta: (NONPLUSSED) THE BOATS - an army of combat ships quickly DROP into the sea and CHURN WATER with unprecedented fury as they quickly make up the distance between them and Finn, FIRING BULLETS as they do so.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: He's getting away!

char.name: COMBAT SHIP
char.dialogue: Not for long.

scene.meta: The LEAD COMBAT SHIP quietly drops a TORPEDO into the water. It skips along, connecting with Finn in his rear and EXPLODING with such force that water skyrockets into the night clouds. UNDERWATER - McMissile SINKS. Then, he blinks. He GRINS. We're starting to like this grin and what follows it. He now CONVERTS into a submarine. From his trunk he releases four DECOY tires which float to the surface like body parts. ON THE DERRICK - Professor Zundapp watches it all from far away.

char.name: GREM (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: He's dead, Professor.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Wunderbar. With Finn McMissile gone, who can stop us now?

scene.meta: TOW MATER, a rusty tow truck, putters into view.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Mater. Tow Mater, that's who... is here to help you!

scene.meta: He approaches a broken-down sedan on the side of the road. He drives around to the front, catching OTIS' face for the first time.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, Otis! 7.

char.name: OTIS
char.dialogue: Hey, Mater. Gosh, I'm so sorry. I thought I could make it this time, but... Smooth like pudding, huh? Ah, who am I kidding? I'll always be a lemon.

scene.meta: engine, stalls) Mater hooks his friend and starts towing him.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well dadgum, you're leaking oil again. Must be your gaskets. Hey, look on the bright side: This is your tenth tow this month, so that means it's on the house.

char.name: OTIS
char.dialogue: You're the only one that's nice to lemons like me, Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Don't sweat it. These things happen to everybody, Otis.

char.name: OTIS
char.dialogue: But you never leak oil.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Yeah, but I ain't perfect. Don't tell nobody, but I think my rust is starting to show through.

scene.meta: Mater and Otis drive past THE RADIATOR SPRINGS WELCOME SIGN. It has been amended to say: "Home of Lightning McQueen."

char.name: OTIS
char.dialogue: Hey, is Lightning McQueen back yet?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Not yet.

char.name: OTIS
char.dialogue: He must be crazy-excited about winning his fourth Piston Cup. Four! Wow! 8.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Yeah, we're so dadgum proud of him. But I sure wish he'd hurry up and get back `cause we got a whole summer's worth of best friend fun to make up for. Just me and --

scene.meta: Ahead of them, a half-mile off, a RED RACE CAR is visible.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: --- McQueen!

scene.meta: Mater FLOORS IT, dragging poor Otis behind him.

char.name: OTIS
char.dialogue: Uh, Mater? I'm in no hurry. You don't need to go so fast!

scene.meta: Lightning McQueen is surrounded by his hometown friends.

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: Oh, Lightning. Welcome home.

scene.meta: FLO Good to have you back, honey.

char.name: FILLMORE
char.dialogue: Congratulations, man.

char.name: SARGE
char.dialogue: Welcome home, soldier.

char.name: SHERIFF
char.dialogue: The place wasn't the same without you, son.

char.name: LIZZIE
char.dialogue: What? Did he go somewhere?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: It's good to be home, everybody.

char.name: MATER (O.S.)
char.dialogue: McQueen!

scene.meta: They all turn around, see Mater speeding into town, with Otis swerving behind him.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater! 9.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: McQueen!

scene.meta: Mater skids into main street and in one swift motion, slingshots Otis forward ---

char.name: OTIS
char.dialogue: Woaahhhhh!

scene.meta: --- where he lands perfectly on the hydraulic lift. Ramone lifts him up, routine.

char.name: RAMONE
char.dialogue: Hey. How far'd you make it this time, Otis?

char.name: OTIS
char.dialogue: Halfway to the county line.

char.name: RAMONE
char.dialogue: Not bad, man.

char.name: OTIS
char.dialogue: I know, I can't believe it either!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: McQueen, welcome back!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, it's so good to see you.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You too, buddy.

scene.meta: Mater and McQueen do an ELABORATE TIRE BUMP (fist bump style).

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Oh, man. You ain't gonna believe the things I got planned for us.

scene.meta: Everyone watches as the tire bump continues.

char.name: MACK
char.dialogue: These best friend greetings get longer every year. 10.

scene.meta: (to Lizzie, an aside)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You ready to have some serious fun?

scene.meta: (TO MCQUEEN)

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Well, actually I've got something to show you first.

scene.meta: CLOSE ON THE PISTON CUP. It has now changed, been adorned with a small likeness of Doc. It says "Hudson Hornet Piston Cup."

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Wow. I can't believe they renamed the Piston Cup after our very own Doc Hudson.

scene.meta: McQueen and Mater are alone, the museum closed to the public. McQueen approaches a "Hudson Hornet" wall with Doc's three Piston cups, framed articles, other racing ephemera.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I know Doc said these things were just old cups, but to have someone else win it just didn't feel right, you know?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, Doc would've been real proud of you. That's for sure.

scene.meta: McQueen and Mater exit the Doc Hudson Museum.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Alright, pal. I've been waiting all summer for this. What've you got planned?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You sure you can handle it?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Come on, you know who you're talking to? This is Lightning McQueen. I can handle anything. 11.

scene.meta: Mater and McQueen roll on an old train track, their tires off. They're on their rims.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Uh.... Mater?!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Just remember, your brakes ain't gonna work on these!

scene.meta: As they head INTO A DARK TUNNEL ---

char.name: MCQUEEN (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Mater!

char.name: MATER (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Relax, these train tracks ain't been used in years!

scene.meta: From inside the tunnel a loud TRAIN HORN. The two friends emerge, going as fast as they can on train tracks, uphill, with no tires.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Come on, come on! Faster, faster!

scene.sceneheader: EXT. FIELD - OUTSIDE RADIATOR SPRINGS - LATER
scene.meta: An ENORMOUS EARTH MOVER sleeps. McQueen and Mater sneak up.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: This is gonna be good!

scene.meta: They blow their horns and he TIPS OVER, tractor-tipping style. They LAUGH at the gag, but soon realize the earth mover's GIANT EXHAUST PIPE is directly above them.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Uh-oh. This ain't gonna be good.

scene.meta: The sun sets. McQueen and Mater roll into town. McQueen looks exhausted. Mater is still full of energy. 12.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Boy, this was the best day ever! And my favorite souvenir?

scene.meta: Mater proudly shows off a dent.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: This new dent!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Boy, Mater. Today was, uh...

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Shoot, that was nothing. Wait til you see what I got planned for tonight.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, Mater. Whoa. I was kind of thinking of just a quiet dinner.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: That's exactly what I was thinking.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: No, I... I meant with Sally, Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Even better! You, me and Miss Sally going out for supper.

scene.meta: McQueen pulls around in front of Mater, stops.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, I meant it would be just me and Sally.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Oh.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: It's just for tonight. We'll do whatever you want tomorrow.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Okay.

scene.meta: (DISAPPOINTED)

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Thanks for understanding.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Yeah, sure. Y'all go on and have fun now. 13.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Alright, then. See ya soon, amigo!

scene.meta: It's been converted into a white-tablecloth restaurant, with cars dining al fresco and a hopping gastropub inside. MCQUEEN AND SALLY have a prime table with a view of Radiator Springs and the starry night sky.

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: This is so nice.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I can't tell you how good it is to be here alone. Just the two of us. Finally, you and me ---

char.name: MATER (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Good evening.

scene.meta: Mater is at their table, dressed as a waiter.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: My name is Mater and I'll be your waiter. Mater the waiter. That's funny right there.

scene.meta: (TO HIMSELF)

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, you work here?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well yeah I work here. What'd you think, I just snuck in here when nobody was looking and pretended to be your waiter, just so I could hang out with you?

scene.meta: McQueen and Sally exchange a look.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Oh, yeah. How ridiculous would that be?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Now, can I start you two lovebirds off with a couple drinks? 14.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Yes. I'll have my usual.

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: You know what? I'm going to have that too.

scene.meta: Mater blinks.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Uh, right. Your usual. CUT TO:

scene.meta: INSIDE AT THE BAR - Fillmore and Sarge watch as Guido mixes drinks, ala "Cocktail." Mater arrives.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Guido! What's McQueen's usual?

char.name: GUIDO
char.dialogue: How should I know?

scene.meta: (in Italian, subtitled)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Perfect! Give me two of `em.

char.name: SARGE
char.dialogue: Quiet! My program's on.

char.name: MEL DORADO (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Tonight on "The Mel Dorado Show"!

scene.meta: ON THE BAR TV - "THE MEL DORADO SHOW," a cable talk show, begins with file footage of MILES AXLEROD, a sleek SUV.

char.name: MEL DORADO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: His story gripped the world! Oil billionaire Miles Axlerod, in an attempt to become the first car to circumnavigate the globe without GPS, ironically ran out of gas and found himself trapped in the wild!

scene.meta: We see images of newspaper headlines, search crews.

char.name: MEL DORADO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Feared dead, he emerged 36 days later, running on a fuel he'd distilled himself from the natural elements! Since then he's sold his oil fortune, converted himself from a gas-guzzler into an electric car, and has devoted his life to finding a renewable, clean-burning fuel! 15.

scene.meta: Images of oil derricks torn down; Miles Axlerod getting converted to electric; lab scientists testing chemicals.

char.name: MEL DORADO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Now he claims to have done it with his Allinol.

scene.meta: Images of fields, rivers, vegetables, and mountains all combining to form the Allinol logo.

char.name: MEL DORADO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: And to show the world what his new superfuel can do, he's created a racing competition like no other, inviting the greatest champions from around the globe to battle in the first ever World Grand Prix. Welcome Sir Miles Axlerod.

scene.meta: SIR MILES AXLEROD arrives, parks across from Mel's desk.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Thank you, Mel. It is very good to be here. Now listen to me: Big Oil. It costs a fortune. Pollution is getting worse. I mean, come on. It's a fossil fuel. Fossil. As in dead dinosaurs. And we all know what happened to them. Alternative energy is the future. Trust me, Mel, after seeing Allinol in action at the World Grand Prix, nobody will ever go back to gasoline again.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: What happened to the dinosaurs, now?

scene.meta: (TO FILLMORE)

char.name: MEL DORADO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: And on satellite, a World Grand Prix competitor and one of the fastest cars in the world, Francesco Bernoulli.

scene.meta: Across the screen: LIVE FROM ROME, ITALY. We meet Formula race car FRANCESCO BERNOULLI.

char.name: FRANCESCO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: It is an honor, Signore Dorado. For you. 16.

char.name: MEL DORADO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Miles, why not invite Lightning McQueen?

scene.meta: Mater, collecting his drinks, looks up, half-intrigued.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Of course we invited him. But apparently after a very long racing season he is taking some time off to rest.

char.name: FRANCESCO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Lightning McQueen would not have a chance against Francesco!

scene.meta: Mater doesn't like this.

char.name: FRANCESCO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: I can go over 300 kilometers an hour! In miles that is like, uh... way faster than McQueen.

char.name: MEL DORADO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Let's go to the phones. Baltimore, Maryland, you're on the air.

char.name: CALLER (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Am I on? Hello?

char.name: MEL DORADO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: You're on. Go ahead.

char.name: CALLER (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Hello?

char.name: MEL DORADO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Go ahead, caller.

scene.meta: Dial tone.

char.name: MEL DORADO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Let's go to Radiator Springs. You're on, caller.

char.name: MATER'S VOICE (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Yeah, that Italian feller you got on there can't talk that way about Lightning McQueen. He's the bestest race car in the whole wide world.

scene.meta: Fillmore and Sarge look around. Mater is visible in the back of the bar on an office phone. 17.

char.name: SARGE
char.dialogue: Uh-oh...

char.name: FRANCESCO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: If he is, how you say "the bestest race car," then why must he rest, eh?

char.name: MATER'S VOICE (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Cause he knows what's important. Every now and then he prefers just to slow down, enjoy life.

char.name: FRANCESCO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Ah, you heard it! Lightning McQueen prefers to be slow! Of course, this is not news to Francesco. When I want to go to sleep I watch one of his races. After two laps I am out cold.

scene.meta: Audible RXNS from the bar. A crowd has been forming ever since Mater started talking.

char.name: MATER'S VOICE (ON TV)
char.dialogue: That ain't what I meant. CUT TO:

scene.meta: MCQUEEN AND SALLY - They hear the commotion inside.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Hey, what's going on over there? CUT BACK TO:

scene.meta: THE BAR - Sally and McQueen push through the crowd, see that they're watching Francesco on the television.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Oh, it's that Italian Formula car. His name is ---

scene.meta: (TO SALLY)

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: Francesco Bernoulli. No wonder there's a crowd.

scene.meta: When Sally says his name, she enunciates each part, as if Italian were her mother's tongue.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Wait, why do you know his name? And don't say it like that. It's three syllables, not ten. 18.

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: What? He's nice to look at. You know, open-wheeled and all.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: What's wrong with fenders? I thought you like my fenders.

char.name: MATER'S VOICE (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Well let me tell you something else there, Mr. San Francisco ---

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater?

char.name: MATER'S VOICE (ON TV)
char.dialogue: McQueen could drive circles around you.

char.name: FRANCESCO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Driving in circles is all he can do, no?

char.name: MATER'S VOICE (ON TV)
char.dialogue: No! I mean yes. I mean he could beat you anywhere, anytime, any track.

scene.meta: On McQueen - he looks at Guido who gives a nod over to --- --- Mater, turned away from the crowd, still on the phone.

char.name: FRANCESCO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Mel, can we move on? Francesco needs a caller who can provide a little more intellectual stimulation. Like a dump truck.

scene.meta: ON MCQUEEN. He doesn't like this at all.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Ha ha! That shows what you know. Dump trucks is dumb.

scene.meta: Suddenly, Mater is YANKED from the booth and replaced by McQueen.

char.name: MCQUEEN (INTO PHONE)
char.dialogue: Yeah, hi, this is Lightning McQueen. Look, I don't appreciate my best friend being insulted like that. 19.

char.name: FRANCESCO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: McQueen! That was your best friend? This is the difference between you and Francesco. Francesco knows how good he is. He does not need to surround himself with tow trucks to prove it.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Those are strong words from a car that is so fragile.

char.name: FRANCESCO (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Fragilé!? He calls Francesco fragilé? Not so fast, McQueen!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: "Not so fast." What is that, your new motto?

scene.meta: Francesco goes ballistic in Italian. They cut his mic.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Well, this sounds like something that needs to be settled on the race course. What do you say, Lightning McQueen? We've still got room for one more racer.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Well, I would love to. The only thing is my crew's off for the season so ---

scene.meta: A sound O.S. McQueen turns to see Fillmore, Sarge and Luigi flank a tablecloth which is hanging off the bar. Ramone backs away, having spray painted "TEAM LIGHTNING MCQUEEN" on it. Guido quickly uncorks three wine bottles.

char.name: GUIDO
char.dialogue: Pit stop.

scene.meta: McQueen turns back to the phone.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: You know what? They just got back. Deal me in, baby. Ka-chow!

scene.meta: The place ERUPTS IN CHEERS. MOMENTS LATER - General excitement as McQueen exits the phone booth where Sally waits. Off her look: 20.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I know, I know. I just got back. But we won't be long and ---

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: Oh, no, don't worry about me. I've got enough to do here. Mater's going to have a blast though. You're bringing Mater, right? You never bring him to any of your races.

scene.meta: (off McQueen's silence) McQueen turns to the bar where Mater privately tries their drinks, hates it, spits it back in the glass.

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: Just let him sit in the pits, give him a headset. C'mon, it'll be a thrill of a lifetime for him.

scene.meta: Mater arrives.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Your drinks, sir.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I didn't taste it!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: How'd you like to come and see the world with me?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You mean it?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: You got me into this thing. You're coming along.

scene.meta: Team McQueen enters via a second floor landing which overlooks a massive indoor party in a converted museum. As they roll down a ramp to the party, they are awed.

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: Guido, look! Ferraris and tires! Let's go!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Hey, look at this. Okay now Mater, remember: best behavior.

scene.meta: (IMPRESSED)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You got it, buddy. Hey, what's that?

scene.meta: He sees something, peels away.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater!

char.name: LEWIS HAMILTON
char.dialogue: Hey, McQueen, over here! 22.

scene.meta: It's fellow racers JEFF GORVETTE and LEWIS HAMILTON. McQueen now has no choice but to let Mater go.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Hey, Jeff. Lewis! CUT TO:

scene.meta: MATER as he approaches a GLASS-ENCLOSED ROCK GARDEN where a pitty RAKES rocks with precision. He knocks on the glass with his hook.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey! You done good! You got all the leaves!

scene.meta: People turn at the noise he's making. CUT BACK TO: MCQUEEN, JEFF and LEWIS.

char.name: JEFF GORVETTE
char.dialogue: Check out that tow truck.

char.name: LEWIS HAMILTON
char.dialogue: I wonder who that guy's with?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Will you guys excuse me just for one little second?

scene.meta: He zips over to Mater's side, quickly pulls him out of sight.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, listen. This isn't Radiator Springs.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You're just realizing that? Boy, that jet-lag really done a number on you.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, look -- things are different over here. Which means maybe you should, you know, act a little different too.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Different than what?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Well, just... help me out here, buddy. I --- 23.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You need help? Shoot, why didn't you just say so? That's what a tow truck does. Hey, looky there, it's Mr. San Francisco!

scene.meta: FRANCESCO is visible across the room, holding court.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I'll introduce you.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, no.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Look at me -- I'm helping you already!

scene.meta: (already on his way) On FRANCESCO - MOMENTS LATER. Mater approaches, giddy.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey Mr. San Francisco, I'd like you to meet ---

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Lightning McQueen! Buona sera.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Nice to meet you, Francesco.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Yeah, nice to meet you too. You are very good-looking. Not as good as I thought, but you're good.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Excuse me. Can I get a picture with you?

scene.meta: (TO FRANCESCO)

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Anything for McQueen's friend.

scene.meta: As Mater poses for a photo with Francesco:

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Miss Sally is gonna flip when she sees this. She's Lightning McQueen's girlfriend.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Oooh. 24.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: She's a big fan of yours.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Hey, she has good taste.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater's prone to exaggeration. I wouldn't say she's a "big" fan.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You're right. She's a huge fan. She goes on and on about your open wheels here.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mentioning it once doesn't qualify as going "on and on."

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Francesco is familiar with this reaction to Francesco. Women respect a car that has nothing to hide.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Yeah, uh...

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Let us have a toast.

scene.meta: McQueen doesn't like where this is going, covers.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Let's.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: I dedicate my win tomorrow... to Miss Sally.

scene.meta: (raising a drink)

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Oh, sorry. I already dedicated MY win tomorrow to her. So if we both do it, it's really not so special. Besides, I don't have a drink.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I'll go get you one. You mind if I borrow a few bucks for one of them drinks? 25.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: They're free, Mater.

scene.meta: (could kill him)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Free? Well, shoot, what am I doing here?

scene.meta: Mater ZIPS OFF.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I should probably go keep an eye on him. See you at the race.

scene.meta: McQueen starts to leave.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Yes, you will see Francesco. But not like this.

scene.meta: Francesco does a 180, so his rear end now faces McQueen.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: You will see him like this, as he drives away from you.

scene.meta: Francesco wears a bumper sticker that says "Ciao, McQueen!"

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: That's cute. So you had one of those made up for all the racers?

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: No.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Okay.

scene.meta: He rolls off.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: He is so getting beat tomorrow.

scene.meta: Lights caress the main stage where a crowd has formed.

char.name: VOICE
char.dialogue: Ladies and gentlecars... Sir Miles Axlerod!

scene.meta: MILES AXLEROD drives through an infinity fountain, appears. 26.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: It is my absolute honor to introduce to you the competitors in the first-ever World Grand Prix. From Brazil. Number eight...

scene.meta: ON FINN MCMISSILE. He appears from the shadows, keeps a careful distance from the stage. He ZEROES HIS GAZE ON --- --- THE WORLD GRAND PRIX TV CAMERAS which roll, catching Miles Axlerod's speech for publicity and posterity. Finn's ONBOARD COMPUTER ANALYZES each one, compares to the photos we saw him snap on the oil platform. Each one is "NOT A MATCH." His view is suddenly disrupted by A BEAUTIFUL SPORTS CAR. She approaches Finn. Meet HOLLEY SHIFTWELL.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: A Volkswagen Karmann Ghia has no radiator.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: That's because it's air-cooled.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: I'm Agent Shiftwell, Holley Shiftwell from the Tokyo Station. I have a message from London.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Not here. You must try the canapes on the mezzanine!

scene.meta: (LOUDLY) He moves her onto an elevator. The doors close on them.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: So the lab boys analyzed the photo I sent? What did they learn about the camera?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: It appears to be a standard television camera. They said if you could get closer photos next time, that would be great.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: This was London's message? 27.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Oh -- no, no. No sir. Um, the oil platforms you were on? Turns out they're sitting on the biggest oil reserve in the world.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: How did we miss that?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: They'd been scrambling everyone's satellites. The Americans actually discovered it just before you did. They placed an agent on that platform, under deep cover. He was able to get a photo of the car who's running the entire operation.

scene.meta: The doors OPEN and they exit onto the Mezzanine.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Who is it? Has anyone seen the photo yet?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: No, not yet. The American is here tonight to pass it to you. He'll signal you when he's ready.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: GOOD ---

scene.meta: Finn suddenly STOPS COLD.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Oh no.

scene.meta: Professor Zundapp is visible below them. He talks with a few Pacers and Gremlins. Finn quickly retreats into the shadows. Holley follows suit.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: What is it?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Change of plan. You're meeting the American.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: What, me? 28.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Those thugs down there were on the oil platform. If they see me, the whole mission is compromised.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: No, no. I'm technical, you see. I'm in Diagnostics. I'm not a field agent.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: You are now. CUT TO:

scene.meta: MATER as he grabs a drink, keeps moving.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I'll take one of them.

scene.meta: He snatches it, drops it in the back where we now see a large assortment of drinks balanced.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Never know which one McQueen'll have a hankering for.

scene.meta: He approaches a sushi bar.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, what you got here that's free? How about that pistachio ice cream?

scene.meta: He refers to wasabi, of course.

char.name: SUSHI CHEF
char.dialogue: No, no. Wasabi.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Oh, same ol', same ol'. What's up with you? That looks delicious.

scene.meta: The chef starts to carve a small scoop aside for Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Uh, a little more, please. It is free, right? Keep it coming. A little more. Come on, let's go, it's free! You're getting there... Scoop scoop!

scene.meta: (the chef adds more) The chef gives in. Scoops a baseball-sized ball out. 29.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: There you go. Now THAT's a scoop of ice cream.

char.name: SUSHI CHEF
char.dialogue: My condolences. CUT BACK TO:

scene.meta: (in Japanese, subtitles) MILES AXLEROD - He's now nearly done with his intros.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: ... and now, our last competitor --- Number 95, Lightning McQueen!

scene.meta: MCQUEEN approaches the microphone, flashes his headlights.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Thank you so much for having us, Sir Axlerod. I really look forward to racing. This is a great opportunity.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: Oh, the pleasure is all ours, Lightning. You and your team bring excellence and professionalism to this competition.

scene.meta: As if on cue, Mater arrives with a piercing scream of pain. Everyone turns as he charges head first toward the stage, making a bee-line for that FOUNTAIN.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Somebody get me water!

scene.meta: He laps up water from the fountain like a diabetic cat.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Sweet relief...

scene.meta: (LAPPING WATER) Miles Axlerod is shocked. The crowd can't believe it. Francesco cackles. Mater, now sated, approaches the mic.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Whatever you do, do not eat the free pistachio ice cream. It has turned!

scene.meta: (to the crowd)

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Sir Axlerod, I can explain. This is Mater. 30.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: I know him. This is the bloke that called into the television show. You're the one I have to thank.

scene.meta: (TO MATER)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: No, thank you. This trip's been amazing.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: He's a little excited, isn't he?

scene.meta: (TO MCQUEEN) TILT DOWN to reveal a pool of oil beneath Mater.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: But wait, I... oh, shoot.

scene.meta: McQueen quickly pulls Mater aside, out of earshot of Miles Axlerod and the others. McQueen is beside himself.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, you have to get a hold of yourself. You're making a scene.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: But I never leak oil. Never.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Go take care of yourself right now.

scene.meta: Mater drives off.
He drives through the party, frantic.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Coming through! Excuse me, leakin' oil. Where's the bathroom? Thank you. I gotta go!

scene.meta: Someone points Mater down a hallway. He whips around the
--- and STOPS. Finds himself in front of TWO BATHROOM DOORS, neither of which clearly indicate MALE or FEMALE. 31.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: What the...

scene.meta: (CONFUSED) Mater chooses one, drives inside. A SHRIEK is heard and Mater zips out.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Sorry ladies!

scene.meta: Mater rolls in, still `holding it in' like a kid.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I never leak I never leak I never leak...

scene.meta: He sees someone leaving a stall. He heads in. IN THE STALL - Mater enters, looks up.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Wowee...

scene.meta: The stall is a complicated apparatus with buttons and lights. High-tech Japanese. It suddenly GRABS MATER, hoists him up as if he's going to get an oil change.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: What in the---

scene.meta: A Japanese style cartoon CARICATURE appears on a TV MONITOR, followed by images of waterfalls and rivers.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, that tickles.

scene.meta: (GIGGLING) The caricature starts talking in Japanese. Suddenly WATER FIRES UP underneath Mater's undercarriage, goosing him. He freaks out. OUTSIDE THE STALL - With Mater's yells audible we see a GREMLIN enter, furtive. Suddenly, inexplicably, his frame BREAKS APART like an egg, revealing an AMERICAN MUSCLE CAR underneath. The pieces of the Gremlin disappear under him, clearly his disguise. This is ROD REDLINE - American Agent. 32.

char.name: ROD REDLINE
char.dialogue: Okay, McMissile. I'm here. It's time for the drop.

scene.meta: HOLLEY, rolls along by herself. Nervous. DING! Her rearview monitor springs to life.

char.name: HOLLEY (INTO RADIO)
char.dialogue: The American has activated his tracking beacon.

char.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: Roger that. Move in.

scene.meta: Holley isolates the tracking beacon's location in the party.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Oh, you've got to be joking.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: What's the problem, Shiftwell?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: He's in the loo. 33.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: So go in!

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: I can't just go into the men's loo.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Time is of the essence, Shiftwell.

scene.meta: Rod Redline is in bad shape. He backs away, betrays a look of concern. He's in trouble here. ACER burns rubber, ready to finish him off. Just as he shifts into DRIVE --- --- MATER'S STALL DOOR KICKS OPEN, knocking ACER out. Mater jumps out, face-to-face GREM.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Whatever you do, I would not go in there.

scene.meta: (out of breath) The door SWINGS shut, revealing the pulverized Acer.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: A Gremlin and a Pacer!

scene.meta: Rod Redline, now behind Mater and sensing an opportunity here, quickly produces A SMALL DEVICE.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: No offense to your makes and models, but you guys break down harder than my cousin Betsy after she got left at the ---

scene.meta: (to Grem and Acer) Rod Redline, surreptitiously attaches the device to Mater's undercarriage.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: --- altar!

scene.meta: (as he's goosed) He spins around, sees Rod Redline for the first time.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Are you okay?

char.name: ROD REDLINE
char.dialogue: I'm fine. 34.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Hey. Tow truck.

scene.meta: Mater turns back to Grem and Acer.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: We'd like to get to our private business here, if you don't mind.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Oh, yeah. Don't let me get in the way of your "private business." Oh! A little advice: When you hear her giggle and see that waterfall, you best press that green button.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Thank you.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: It's to adjust the temperature.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: Got it.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Remember it's in Celsius, not Fahrenheit.

char.name: GREM AND ACER
char.dialogue: Get outta here!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Alright then.

scene.meta: Holley arrives at the door. She takes a breath, is about to enter when Mater EXITS.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Excuse me, ma'am.

scene.meta: He passes her, expelling some exhaust in the process. Holley's rearview tracking confirms that the device is on him.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Dadgum pistachio ice cream. 35.

scene.meta: (TO HIMSELF)

char.name: HOLLEY (INTO RADIO)
char.dialogue: This cannot be him.

char.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: Is he American?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Look out, ladies. Mater's fittin' to get funky!

scene.meta: (driving off, to himself)

char.name: HOLLEY (INTO RADIO)
char.dialogue: Extremely.

char.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: Then it's him.

scene.meta: It's settled. Holley takes one more nervous breath, quickly closes the distance between her and Mater, cuts him off. He is forced to STOP.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Hello.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, hello.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: A Volkswagen Karmann Ghia has no radiator.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well of course it doesn't. That's `cause it's air-cooled!

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Perfect. I'm from the Tokyo Station OF THE---

scene.meta: (RELIEVED)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Course, Karmann Ghia's weren't the only ones. Besides the Beetles you had your Type-3 Squarebacks, with the pancake motors...

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Yeah. Okay, I get it---

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: ... And before both of them, there's the Type-2 buses - my buddy Fillmore's one of them. 36.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Listen! We should find somewhere more private.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Uh, gee. Don't you think that's a little, uh ---

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: You're right. Impossible to know which areas here are compromised. So, when can I see you again?

scene.meta: (NERVOUS ENERGY)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, let's see. Tomorrow I'll be out there at the races.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Got it. We'll rendezvous then.

scene.meta: Mater returns to his team, lost in thought.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: There you are. Where have you been?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: What's a rendezvous?

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: It's like a date.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: A date?!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, what's going on?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, what's going on is I've got me a date tomorrow.

scene.meta: Guido makes a crack in Italian.

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: Guido don't believe you.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, believe it. My new girlfriend just said so. Hey, there she is.

scene.meta: Mater points out Holley, who's within earshot. 37.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey! Hey lady!

scene.meta: (YELLING) Holley, caught in plain view, DRIVES OFF.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: See ya tomorrow!

scene.meta: Guido makes another crack in Italian.

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: Guido still don't believe you.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SHIPYARD - THE DOCKS - TOKYO NIGHT

scene.meta: Rod Redline dangles from a car magnet. He's been beaten up, clings to consciousness.

char.name: GREM (O.S.)
char.dialogue: I gotta admit ---

scene.meta: Grem, Acer, and a bunch of nasty looking troublemakers look up at Rod amidst crates and shipping containers.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: --- you tricked us real good.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: And we don't like being tricked.

scene.meta: Rod Redline laughs to himself.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: Hey, what's so funny?

char.name: ROD REDLINE
char.dialogue: Well, you know, I was just wearing a disguise. You guys are stuck looking like that.

scene.meta: This doesn't help him. They DROP HIM onto a TREADMILL, lock him down. A container is wheeled forward and Rod is plied with Allinol brand gasoline.

char.name: ROD REDLINE
char.dialogue: Allinol? Thanks, fellas. I hear this stuff is good for you. 38.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP (O.S.)
char.dialogue: So you think.

scene.meta: The Professor emerges from the darkness, behind Rod.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Allinol by itself is good for you.

scene.meta: Zundapp hits a button and the TREADMILL starts Rod's wheels spinning at a high rate of speed.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: But after microscopic examination, I have found that it has one small weakness. When hit with an electromagnetic pulse, it becomes extremely dangerous.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: SMILE ---

scene.meta: Grem pushes a World Grand Prix CAMERA - the same one that was in the box back at the oil derrick. He points it at Rod Redline.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: --- for the camera.

char.name: ROD REDLINE
char.dialogue: Is that all you want? I got a whole act.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: You were very interested in this camera on the oil platform. Now you will witness what it really does.

char.name: ROD REDLINE
char.dialogue: Whatever you say, Professor.

scene.meta: Acer pushes a TV MONITOR toward Rod. On it, surveillance footage from the party. Clearly, they were watching and recording him there.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: You talked up a lot of cars last night. Which one's your associate?

char.name: ROD REDLINE
char.dialogue: Your mother. Oh no, I'm sorry. It was your sister. You know, I can't tell them apart these days. 39.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Could I start it now, Professor?

scene.meta: (HAD ENOUGH)

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Fifty percent power. This camera is actually an electromagnetic pulse emitter.

scene.meta: (to Rod Redline)

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: What about her? Did you give it to her?

scene.meta: (re: a girl on the TV)

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: The Allinol is now heating to a boil, dramatically expanding, causing the engine block to crack under the stress, forcing oil into the combustion chamber.

scene.meta: Rod Redline's engine starts to CRACK and BREAK.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: How about him? You talk to him?

scene.meta: (re: a guy on the TV)

char.name: ROD REDLINE
char.dialogue: What do I care? I can replace an engine block.

scene.meta: (to Professor Zundapp)

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: You may be able to, but after full impact of the pulse, unfortunately, there will be nothing to replace.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: How about him? Does he have it?

scene.meta: The monitor reveals MATER, rolling out of the bathroom and down the hall. Rod Redline, seeing this, does the world's most subtle double take. We caught it, but there's no way anyone else in the room could have ---

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: That's him. He's the one.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Roger that, Professor Z. 40.

char.name: ROD REDLINE
char.dialogue: No!

scene.meta: As Grem turns up the machine even MORE, the Professor makes a call.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP (INTO PHONE)
char.dialogue: Yes sir. We believe the infiltrator has passed along sensitive information. I will take care of it before any damage can be done.

scene.meta: (beat, listening) The Professor hangs up, turns to the room.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: The project is still on schedule. You will find this second agent ---

scene.meta: Zundapp kicks the camera's power into the RED.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: --- and kill him.

scene.meta: Over television pre-roll of Japan:

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Japan. Land of the rising sun. Where ancient tradition meets modern technology. Welcome to the inaugural running of the World Grand Prix.

scene.meta: ON OUR ANNOUNCERS as they introduce themselves:

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER
char.dialogue: I'm Brent Mustangburger, here with racing legends Darrell Cartrip and David Hobbscap. There's never been a competition like this before.

scene.meta: SHOTS OF THE PITS as the racers fuel up.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: First, Allinol, making its debut tonight as the required fuel for all these great champions. 41.

scene.meta: (MORE)

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.) (CONT'D)
char.dialogue: Second, the course itself, and it's like nothing we've ever seen. David, how exactly does this competition work?

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Well, Brent, all three of these street courses are classic round- the-house racetracks.

scene.meta: OUTLINES OF THREE RACE COURSES are shown. They're labeled Japan, Italy and England, and are different in shape and size.

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: This means that the LMP and Formula cars should break out of the gate in spectacular fashion.

scene.meta: SHOTS OF THE RACERS as they weave up the track, practicing.

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Look for Francesco Bernoulli in particular to lead early.

scene.meta: SHOTS OF Francesco, featured in an inset.

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: And with a series of technical turns throughout ---

scene.meta: MORE SHOTS of the course, now highlighting the tech turns.

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: GT and Touring cars like Spain's Miguel Camino should make up some ground but I doubt it'll be enough to stop Francesco from absolutely running away with it.

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Woah, now just hold your horsepower. You're forgetting the most important factor here. That early dirt track section of the course! The dirt is supposed to be the great equalizer in this race.

scene.meta: GRAPHICS OF THE COURSES now isolate a stretch after the first couple turns, label it "DIRT SECTIONS." 42.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: French Rally car Raoul ÇaRoule is counting on a big boost headed through there.

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: And don't forget Lightning McQueen! His mentor, the Hudson Hornet, was one of the greatest dirt track racers of all time. In my opinion, McQueen is the best all-around racer in this competition.

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP
char.dialogue: Really, Darrell, I think you need to clean your windshield. You're clearly not seeing this for what it is: Francesco's race to lose.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: It's time to find out. The racers are locking into the grid ---

scene.meta: Engines rev as everyone gets ready to go. Everyone's bright eyed and alert except for McQueen who we find in the back of the grid. He CLOSES his eyes.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Speed. I am speed.

scene.meta: (TO HIMSELF) A LAUGH O.S. McQueen opens his eyes. Francesco is next to him on the grid.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Really? You are "speed"? Then Francesco is triple speed. Francesco. Is. Triple speed. Francesco likes this, McQueen. It's really getting him into the zone!

scene.meta: (closes his eyes)

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: He is so getting beat today.

scene.meta: The starting lights click down from RED to YELLOW to GREEN. The race begins. Francesco quickly grabs the lead. He's pulling away within seconds. 43. ON PIT ROW - We TRACK PAST as the various Crew Chiefs on their crash carts bark orders to their racers. We end on Team McQueen. No Crew Chief, just a solid looking team.

char.name: SARGE
char.dialogue: His suspension stats look good.

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: Tire pressure is excellent.

char.name: FILLMORE
char.dialogue: He's got plenty of fuel.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: And he's awesome! CUT TO:

scene.meta: The same view of Mater but now THROUGH A TELESCOPIC DISPLAY. Reveal Finn and Holley watching from high above in a downtown office building, behind reflective glass.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Why is he in the pits? He's so exposed.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: It's his cover. One of the best I've seen, too. Look at the detail on that rust. It must have cost him a fortune.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: But why hasn't he contacted us yet?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: There's probably heat on him. Be patient.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Right, of course. He'll signal us when he can.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: And then we find out who's behind all this.

scene.meta: ON THE TRACK - VARIOUS SHOTS OF THE RACE through Tokyo as Francesco extends his lead and McQueen attempts to make up ground. 44. IN MCQUEEN'S PIT - Mater watches the monitors, sees them approaching the dirt section.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: McQueen! It's time to make your move. Get on the outside and show 'em what Doc done taught you.

char.name: MCQUEEN (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: Ten four, Mater.

scene.meta: ON THE TRACK - Francesco hits the dirt section and loses all control. He SLAMS to a halt, his tires getting no traction.

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Francesco is brought to a screeching halt!

scene.meta: MCQUEEN skids into view, turning right to go left, passing Francesco, followed by other cars ---

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Lightning McQueen is the first to take advantage. And just like that, folks, Francesco's lead is left in the dust.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Nice call, Mater. Keep it up!

scene.meta: McQueen now leads the pack, zooming out of the dirt now starting to relax.

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Who-hoo! Man, McQueen looks happier than a rollbar at a demolition derby!

char.name: ON PAVED ROAD AGAIN - MOMENTS LATER

scene.meta: The field of cars thunders into a tunnel.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Everyone's jostling for position as we hit the asphalt again.

scene.meta: Francesco crests the hill, in last place. He bites down, determined, then CHASES.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Francesco lost a lot of momentum in the dirt. He's got some serious work ahead of him if he wants to get back in this race. 45.

scene.meta: VARIOUS SHOTS OF TOKYO as the racers move through the Rainbow Bridge. Bit by bit, Francesco ekes his way toward the front, toward Lightning McQueen as we CUT TO --- --- A ROOFTOP, and a VIEW THROUGH THE WGP CAMERA LENS. Grem and Acer are manning this one. They focus it on the racers as they approach.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: It is time.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Roger that.

scene.meta: ON THE TRACK - A racer (Miguel Camino) suddenly PLUMES WITH SMOKE and skids out.

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Oh! Miguel Camino has blown an engine!

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Very unusual, Darrell. He's been so consistent all year.

scene.meta: Camino quickly pits, passing McQueen's pit where Mater is visible. ON GREM AND ACER, watching from above.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: You gotta be kidding me.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: What is it?

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: It's that tow truck from the bathroom.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: The one from the bathroom?

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Yeah, the one the American Agent passed the device to.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: What about him?

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: What about him? He's in the pits! 46.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: Not for long.

scene.meta: Acer exits, with purpose. ON FINN AND HOLLEY, still in their office hideaway. Holley's onboard computer flashes an ALERT.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Hold on. I think I've got something.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: What is it?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: The Pacer from the party last night.

scene.meta: She's spotted Acer, moving swiftly forward.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Cross-referencing with the photos from the oil derricks... Yep. His VIN numbers match.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Anyone with him? He won't be alone.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Conducting analysis on the target.

scene.meta: The computer finds more and more bad guy Pacers and Gremlins are in the crowd.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: He's not the only one here. Three... five... they're everywhere. And they're all closing in on... oh no.

scene.meta: We PAN OVER to see it's MATER.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Finn? Finn, where are you?

scene.meta: She turns. He's GONE, leaving only an open window.

char.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: Get him out of the pits now!

scene.meta: IN MCQUEEN'S PIT. A car WHIPS BY O.S. 47.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Wow! Some of them fellers is really loud.

char.name: HOLLEY (OVER MATER'S RADIO)
char.dialogue: Can you hear me? Over.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Uh, what?

char.name: HOLLEY (OVER MATER'S RADIO)
char.dialogue: Get out of the pit now. Do you hear me?

scene.meta: Mater realizes this girl has somehow broken into his radio.

char.name: MATER (INTO RADIO)
char.dialogue: Hey, I know you. You're that girl from the party last night. You wanna do our date right now?

scene.meta: ON THE TRACK - McQueen boxes out Francesco, holds his slim lead, but barely.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Guys, a little too much chatter. Let's keep this line clear.

scene.meta: BOOM! A racer behind McQueen suddenly expels black smoke, skids out of control. ON GREM - laughing. That was clearly his handiwork.

char.name: HOLLEY (ON MATER'S RADIO)
char.dialogue: There's no time for messing about. You've got to get out of the pits.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Is there gonna be cable where you is so I can watch the rest of the race?

scene.meta: ON HOLLEY - Watching from the downtown building.

char.name: HOLLEY (INTO RADIO)
char.dialogue: You're running out of time!

char.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: They're coming, Shiftwell.

char.name: HOLLEY (INTO RADIO)
char.dialogue: Yes, I know. 48.

char.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: Get him out of there.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: I'm trying. Get out now!

scene.meta: (TO MATER) We CUT BACK TO --- --- MATER. He gives in, exits the pit.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, all right but I usually like to have a proper detailing done before I meet a lady friend.

scene.meta: He moves toward the back PIT DOOR, is about to open it. OUTSIDE THE PITS - ACER and another Pacer approach McQueen's pit door on the other side. Ready to pounce. The doors OPEN,
--- Finn, holding a fire extinguisher.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: Finn McMissile? But you're dead!

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Then this shouldn't hurt at all.

scene.meta: He empties the extinguisher in their eyes, speeds past. They try and follow, but have been blinded. One of them crashes right into a COP. ON FINN - Already on the move, along a side street.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Miss Shiftwell?

scene.meta: ON HOLLEY - Tracking everything on a grid map. Mater looks like Pac Man, weaving through the streets as bad guys close in all around him.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: I've got him in the back alleys east of the garages. Multiple assailants are closing in quickly.

char.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: Keep him moving. I'm on my way.

scene.meta: ON MATER - He turns a corner, sees a flower shop. 49.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, new lady friend? You like flowers?

scene.meta: ON THE TRACK - McQueen, hearing this, is taken aback.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: What?

scene.meta: ON MATER - Slowing at the flower shop.

char.name: HOLLEY (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: No! Don't go 'in' anywhere. Just keep moving.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Stay outside. Gotcha.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Outside?

scene.meta: McQueen drifts outside allowing Francesco to slip past!

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Grazie and arrivaderci!

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: I cannot believe what I just saw, Brent. That was a bonehead move. You don't open up the inside like that!

scene.meta: IN THE BACK ALLEYS - As Mater moves on he's followed by Pacers and Gremlins. Suddenly --- --- CABLES whip in front of them, pulling over flower vending machines and sending the shop's owners into a frenzy. They direct their attention to the AMCs, who try and explain. ON FINN, admiring his handiwork as he appears. Just as he turns to leave he's BROADSIDED and pushed INTO A DARK ALLEY. IN THE ALLEY - Finn finds himself boxed by two Pacers and pushed toward --- --- ACER, who now holds a FLAME THROWER.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: This time I'm gonna make sure you stay dead.

scene.meta: He hits the flame. WHOOOSSSH!! 50. ON ANOTHER STREET - Mater clicks along, still looking for Holley. Just as he passes the alley entrance where Finn stares down death:

char.name: HOLLEY (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: You're doing brilliantly. Now just stay focused.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: What's that? You want me to head toward that ruckus?

scene.meta: Mater turns INTO the alley.

char.name: HOLLEY (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: No! Don't go down that street!

scene.meta: IN THE ALLEY - Finn, now nearly pushed completely into the flame thrower, leaps into the air. He FIGHTS BACK, using his wheels, axle, indeed his entire car frame as if he were human, kicking and tossing and shooting his enemies. Mater witnesses the whole thing.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Wow! A live karate demonstration!

scene.meta: ON THE TRACK - McQueen, now playing catch-up again, scowls.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Stop it, Mater. Just sign off.

scene.meta: IN THE BACK ALLEY - Finn polishes off the AMCs by firing a bullet into a gas main line, causing an EXPLOSION that tosses Acer through the air where he lands in a NOODLE SHOP'S SIGN. ON THE TRACK - The end of the race is nigh ---

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: They're bumper to bumper as they approach the finish line!

scene.meta: The Formula car gets there first.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Francesco's the winner, McQueen's number two!

scene.meta: IN THE ALLEY - Finn heaves breaths, surveys his damage.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: That was cool! Hey, can I get your autograph? 51.

scene.meta: Mater approaches when a MASS OF RACE FANS burst out a door, momentarily blocking Mater's view of Finn. Once the fans have past, Finn has disappeared.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, where'd he go?

char.name: HOLLEY (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: Our rendezvous has been jeopardized. Keep the device safe. We'll be in touch.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Dadgum, did I miss our date?

scene.meta: Post race press conference. Francesco is center stage.

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP
char.dialogue: Francesco, over here! Hey, what was your strategy today?

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Strategia? Francesco needs no strategy, it's very simple. You start the race, wait for Lightning McQueen to choke, pass him, then win. Francesco always wins. It's boring.

scene.meta: McQueen, waiting in the wings, rolls his eyes. He suddenly notices something O.S. McQueen's P.O.V. - It's MATER, appearing from a side street, moving toward the pits, oblivious of the press conference.

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP
char.dialogue: I gotta tell you, dude. You were in trouble for awhile. That dirt track section had you crawling!

scene.meta: (TO FRANCESCO) As McQueen SNEAKS AWAY ---

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: To truly crush one's dream, you must first raise their hopes very high.

scene.meta: IN MCQUEEN'S PIT GARAGE - Mater looks around for everyone as McQueen approaches. 52.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey McQueen! What happened? Is the race over? You won, right?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, why were you yelling things at me while I was racing?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Yelling? Oh, you thought... that's funny right there. Nah, see that's `cause I seen these two fellers doing some sort of karate street performance. It was nutso. One of them even had a flamethrower ---

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: A flamethrower? What are you talking about? I don't understand. Where were you?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Going to meet my date.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Your date?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: She started talking to me as a voice in my head, telling me where to go ---

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: What?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Wait a minute -- I didn't screw you up, did I?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I lost the race because of you!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, I'm sorry. I didn't mean ---

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: An imaginary girlfriend, flamethrowers. This is exactly why I don't bring you along to these things. 53.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Maybe if I, I don't know, talked to somebody and explained what happened I could help.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I don't need your help. I don't want your help.

char.name: PRESS (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Hey, there he is!!

scene.meta: The press finds McQueen, swarms him. Mater is pushed backwards as the questions fly again.

char.name: PRESS
char.dialogue: - McQueen, you had it in the bag! - Yeah, what happened?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I made a mistake. But I can assure you, it won't happen again.

scene.meta: On Mater. He takes this badly.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Look, guys. We know what the problem is and we've taken care of it. SMASH TO:

scene.meta: OVER FOOTAGE OF FRANCESCO and various other highlights:

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER
char.dialogue: Lightning McQueen loses in the last lap to Francesco Bernoulli in the first race of the World Grand Prix and three, count em, three cars flamed out leading some to suggest that their fuel, Allinol, might be to blame.

scene.meta: FOOTAGE OF MILES AXLEROD, speaking to an aggressive press. He must SHOUT over the press.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: Allinol is safe! Alternative fuel is safe! There is no way my fuel caused these cars to flame out! 54.

scene.meta: IN THE TV STUDIO - Darrell, Brent and David talk to camera.

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP
char.dialogue: Well the jury may still be out on whether Allinol caused these accidents, but one thing's for sure: Lightning McQueen blew this race.

scene.meta: Off a FROZEN IMAGE of McQueen crossing the finish line, a look of severe consternation across his face ---

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER
char.dialogue: Team McQueen can't be happy right now.

scene.meta: --- McQueen's SMILING FACE, on a Team McQueen poster. REVERSE to reveal Mater looking at it, sadly. He drives on, passing (but not noticing) --- --- GREM and ACER. AT THE SECURITY CHECK - MOMENTS LATER. Cars take off their tires, move through the metal detector. Mater waits in line. A SECURITY CAR approaches Mater.

char.name: SECURITY CAR
char.dialogue: Come with me please, sir.

scene.meta: (in Japanese and English)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: But I'm gonna miss my plane.

scene.meta: IN THE ADMIRAL'S LOUNGE - MOMENTS LATER. The Security Car leads Mater inside.

char.name: SECURITY CAR
char.dialogue: Right this way.

scene.meta: As they move past us the Security Car covertly drops a BALL BEARING which rolls into a corner. The ball bearing then sprouts MECHANICAL LEGS, tripods itself and IRISES out, revealing itself to be a tiny CAMERA.

char.name: IN THE MAIN ROOM - ADMIRAL'S LOUNGE - CONTINUOUS

scene.meta: Mater follows the Security Car in, nervous. 55.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Doggone it. This is about my hook, isn't it? I know I should've checked it, but I can't really, look -- it's attached to me.

scene.meta: ZWAPPPPPP!! The Security Car suddenly DECLOAKS himself, reveals himself to be Finn McMissile!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, I know you. You're that feller from the karate demonstration.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: I never properly introduced myself. Finn McMissile. British Intelligence.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Tow Mater. Average intelligence.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Who are you with? FBI, CIA?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Let's just say I'm triple-A affiliated. You know, I know some karate. I don't wanna brag or nothing, but I've got me a black fan belt.

scene.meta: BEEP! Finn's rearview alarms. His camera has picked up Grem and Acer. They've just entered the lounge, are right around the corner.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, you wanna see some moves I made up?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: You're being followed.

scene.meta: Finn quickly turns, fires a tiny GLASS CUTTING BEETLE at the window. As Mater talks, oblivious, the beetle cuts out a round hole.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: This first one I can reach into a car's hood, pull out his battery, and show it to him before he stalls. I call it, "What I accidentally did to my friend Luigi once." 56.

scene.meta: Mater does his best (worst) karate moves as Acer and Grem turn the corner.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: There he is!

scene.meta: The glass drops away, leaving a car-sized hole.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Look, I probably ought to go. I'm about to miss my flight.

scene.meta: (eyes the clock)

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Don't worry.

scene.meta: Finn HOOKS Mater from behind. He YANKS HIM forward ---

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: I've taken care of that. Hang on.

scene.meta: Finn pulls Mater down HARD onto the tarmac, towing him away from the terminal.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: This is First Class service. You don't even have to go through the terminal.

scene.meta: ACER and GREM appear, chasing them. Mater, who is facing backward as he is being pulled along, faces them. They're about a hundred yards back.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Your karate partners are back here. They kinda look like they're trying to catch up!

scene.meta: (TO FINN)

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Drive forward. Whatever you do, don't stop.

scene.meta: Finn SKIDS around, whipping Mater in a 180 so that Mater is now towing Finn. Grem produces a ROCKET, lines up Finn as his target. 57. Finn, without hesitation, fires a MINI ROLLING-JACK. The jack DRIVES ITSELF toward Grem, anchors itself under his frame and flips him like a turtle but not before Grem gets the rocket
THE ROCKET - it flies toward Mater and Finn. FINN aims and launches a MISSILE back.

char.name: THE ROCKET AND MISSILE COLLIDE IN MID-AIR, EXPLODE.
MATER
char.dialogue: Is everything okay back there?

scene.meta: (only hearing this)

char.name: SIDDELEY (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Finn, it's Sid. I'm on approach.

scene.meta: A GULFSTREAM JET wings into view overhead. This is SIDDELEY.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Roger that.

scene.meta: Mater looks up: ACER screeches into view up ahead, dragging a long row of luggage carts in Mater's path, attempting to create an accident.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You remember that whole thing about me not stopping no matter what?

scene.meta: (TO FINN) Just as it looks dire --- RATATATATATATAT!!! SIDDELEY descends, hawklike, fires bullets and blows the luggage carts sky-high. Mater and Finn burst through them, luggage now raining down from above.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I knew I should've done carry-on!

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Thanks, old boy!

scene.meta: (TO SIDDELEY) Siddeley LANDS HARD on the tarmac ahead of them. No time to stop, he DROPS his back open, revealing HOLLEY.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, doggone it. It's my imaginary girlfriend!

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Come on! Get in here! 58.

scene.meta: Mater SPEEDS UP toward Siddeley's ramp, Holley.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Boy I tell you what, you really do want this first date, don't ya? That's a no-quit attitude right there.

scene.meta: (TO HOLLEY) Just as Mater's wheels touch the ramp, BULLETS PING around him in a spray. Siddeley is HIT, a tire BLOWN. He yells in pain.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Hold on, Sid!

scene.meta: Siddeley peels off the runway onto the grass. A gunfight ensues between Finn and Acer. Finn SHOOTS ACER'S TIRE, blowing it and throwing him off-course. Acer CAREENS out of control, drives up and THROUGH A JET --- --- OUT THE OTHER SIDE where he lands in an oil tanker. ON SIDDELEY - He's headed toward the edge of the tarmac, where the grass and runway meet WATER. He HITS THE GAS, his only hope.

char.name: SIDDELEY
char.dialogue: Finn, it's now or never!

scene.meta: Finn BRAKES, 180s and grabs the ramp just as Siddeley gets air.

char.name: SIDDELEY
char.dialogue: Hold on!

scene.meta: Mater, the only thing not in the jet, dangles and recedes from our view as Siddeley climbs toward the clouds. As he's PULLED in through the back hatch:

char.name: MATER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: By the time you read this, I will be safely on an airplane, flying home.

scene.meta: CLOSE ON a handwritten (er, tire-written?) NOTE in childish scrawl. We don't see all of it, only a bit. Mater's voice O.S. begins the note with the first sentence, but we DISSOLVE into McQueen's voice. 59.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: "I'm so sorry for what I did. I don't want to be the cause of you losing any more races. I want you to go prove to the world what I already know - that you are the greatest race car in the whole wide world. Your best friend, Mater."

scene.meta: McQueen takes this in.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I didn't really want him to leave.

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: Wait, there's more here. "P.S. Please tell the hotel I didn't mean to order that movie. I thought it was just a preview and I didn't realize I was paying for it. P.P.S... That's funny right there -- PP." There's a few more pages of P.S.'s here.

scene.meta: (to the others)

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Well, at least I know if he's at home he'll be safe.

scene.meta: A well-appointed spy jet. Various computers line the walls.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Now that's how I like to start the day! You never feel more alive than when you're almost dead.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: I hope that device didn't fall off.

scene.meta: (SCANNING MATER)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: That's the closest I ever been to missing my flight! That was --- 60.

scene.meta: With a ROBOTIC ARM, Holley grabs the THE DEVICE that Rod Redline hid under Mater. She yanks it out with a GOOSE.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Yow!

scene.meta: (JUMPS)

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Still in one piece, great.

scene.meta: Holley drops the device into a mainframe computer. It starts

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I gotta go to a doctor. I keep getting these sharp pains in my undercarriage.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Downloading the photo now.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, lemme introduce you two. This here is Finn McSomething-or- other. He's a First Class VIP airport whatchamacallit. And Finn, this here's my date. I never did get your name.

scene.meta: (TO HOLLEY)

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Oh yes, sorry. It's Shiftwell. Holley Shiftwell.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: It's Shiftwell. Holley ---

scene.meta: (TO FINN) DING! The computer is done analyzing. The cabin lights dim.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Finally. Time to see who's behind all this.

scene.meta: AN IMAGE is blasted between the three of them. It's of a photograph, a complicated melange of metallic parts stuck together.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: What is this? 61.

scene.meta: (to Mater, expectantly)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, that's one of the worst engines ever made. It's an old aluminum V8 with a Lucas electrical system and Whitworth bolts. Shoot, them Whitworth bolts is a pain, tell you what. Them ain't metric, they ain't inches...

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Yes, OK, right. But who's engine is this, Mater?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, it's kinda hard to tell from this picture, ain't it?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: But you're the one who took it.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Holley.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Oh, right. Yes, of course. "A good agent gets what he can, then gets out before he's killed." Sorry.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Agent? You mean like insurance agent, like, `Like a good neighbor, Mater is there'? Wait, you mean secret agents. You guys is spies!

scene.meta: (SINGS)

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Holley, in how many makes and models did this type of engine appear?

scene.meta: Holley has these stats in seconds. Kid's play.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: It was standard in seven models over a 12-year period. At least 35,000 cars were made with this engine.

scene.meta: Mater MOVES HIS SEAT FORWARD, through one part of the hologram so he's face-to-face with Holley.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You're pretty. 62.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Yes, alright. Thank you.

scene.meta: (ANNOYED)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: And so nice.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Just pay attention.

scene.meta: She moves the engine photo so it's now blocking Mater again.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: This seems like a dead end. If there were something in the photo that could narrow this down a bit I'd be a lot happier.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You might not be happy, but I bet this feller is. See how he's had most of his parts replaced? And see all them boxes over there? Them's all original parts. They ain't easy to come by.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Rare parts.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: That's something we can track.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Exactly!

scene.meta: Holley drops her screen down.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Well done, Mater! I would never have seen that. I know of a black-market parts dealer in Paris, a treacherous lowlife. But, he's the only car in the world who can tell us whose engine this is. Mater, what would you say to setting up an informal task force on this one?

scene.meta: (TO HOLLEY)
