char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Wait, what? 63.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: You obviously have plenty of experience in the field.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well yeah I live right next to one. I don't know, Finn. I ain't exactly been much help to anybody recently.

scene.meta: (thinks about it)

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: You're helping me. Please, Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, okay. But you know I'm just a tow truck, right?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Right. And I'm just in the import/export business. Siddeley?

char.name: SIDDELEY
char.dialogue: Yes, Finn?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Paris. Tout de suite.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Yeah, two of them sweets for me too, Sid! You know, I always wanted to be a spy.

scene.meta: (TO HOLLEY)

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Really? Me too.

scene.meta: (SMILING SWEETLY)

char.name: SIDDELEY
char.dialogue: Afterburners, sir?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Is there any other way?

scene.meta: Siddeley HITS THE JUICE, they kick forward like a mule as we

A MONTAGE OF PARIS: Mater attempts to merge into roundabout traffic; mimes annoy tourists at the Eiffel Tower; a painter works his magic on an unattractive couple; a couple kisses on the most romantic spot in the world; we might even catch

--- a dirty street in the 1st Arrondissement. Finn and Holley drive along together as Mater, playing "spy," darts back and forth behind them from doorway to dumpster, "hiding out." He's having a ball.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Once we're inside, stay close. Don't bother checking VIN numbers for criminal records, they're all dodgy here.

scene.meta: (TO HOLLEY)

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: No VIN scans. Got it.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Don't talk to anyone. Don't look at anyone. And absolutely, positively no idling. Are we clear?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Yes, right. No idling. Yes, sir.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Mater?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Yeah, Finn?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: We're not here to go shopping.

scene.meta: As Finn and Holley and Mater turn the corner...

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Shopping? What do you mean? Why would I ---

scene.meta: Mater turns the corner and enters a massive Les Halles- inspired Parisian market filled with car parts. A tow truck's dream.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Dadgum.

char.name: MERCHANTS
char.dialogue: - Parts for sale, Monsieur! - Monsieur! Parts for sale! 65.

scene.meta: Mater rolls along, impressed by the goods for sale.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You gotta be kidding me - they've got everything here. Look at them hoods! I could use a hood.

scene.meta: Mater continues on though, heeding Finn's advice.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Sorry fellers, I gotta go.

scene.meta: Mater, now out of sight of Finn and Holley, passes a darkened stall. He STOPS, peers in. There's someone in there.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Excuse me. What are you selling?

scene.meta: It suddenly OPENS its headlights revealing... EYES!! In French, the mutant car pitches his wares to Mater. Mater FREAKS OUT, speeds off, TERRIFIED.

char.name: AROUND THE CORNER - FINN AND HOLLEY

scene.meta: A few car lengths ahead of Mater. They roll along, looking for... Aha! Finn and Holley recede into the shadows. In FINN'S SIDE MIRROR: TOMBER, a three-wheeled parts dealer, argues with a French customer.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: There you are.

scene.meta: Mater suddenly turns the corner, sees Finn and Holley.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Man, there are some great ---

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Mater, get back!

scene.meta: Too late. Tomber sees Mater, then notices FINN, reflected in a hubcap. He BOLTS. Finn and Holley give chase.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, wait for me!

scene.meta: Tomber, skidding away, kicks a tent in Finn's way. Holley quickly pivots RIGHT and disappears. Where did she go? 66. Finn, hot in pursuit, leaps another obstacle and loses ground

--- Tomber who turns a corner and finds himself grill to grill with HOLLEY. He whips to the left but TURNS OVER, rolling sideways and CRASHING to a stop. Holley ZAPS him with ELECTROSHOCKERS. Finn suddenly arrives, stops her.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Have you lost your mind?!

scene.meta: (TO HOLLEY)

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: But I thought ---

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Mater! This chap needs a tow. Hook him up.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Sure thing. CUT TO:

scene.meta: MOMENTS LATER - Mater tows Tomber, following Finn and Holley.

char.name: TOMBER
char.dialogue: You rusty piece of junk, get your dirty hook off me!

scene.sceneheader: INT. A SMALL GARAGE - MOMENTS LATER
scene.meta: Finn throws open a door. Cars scatter like cockroaches.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Allez! Maintenant - vite!

scene.meta: (to the cars) Mater unhooks an angry Tomber who spits in French. Finn pulls the door down. As it LATCHES TIGHT ---

char.name: TOMBER
char.dialogue: Electroshock! Are you kidding me??

scene.meta: (TO FINN)

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Easy, Tomber. This is her first field assignment - she didn't know you were my informant.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Informant? 67.

char.name: TOMBER
char.dialogue: A rookie, eh? I never liked new car- smell.

scene.meta: Holley FUMES with anger.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Tomber was doing 20 to life in a Moroccan impound the first time I saved him, if I recall correctly.

char.name: TOMBER
char.dialogue: Speaking of recalls, you're getting up there in mileage aren't you, Finn?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Alright, we get it. You both know each other, you're both old. So.

scene.meta: Holley shoots a HOLOGRAPHIC PHOTO of the engine in front of Tomber.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: There you go, informant. Inform us.

scene.meta: Tomber eyes the photo. He recoils, unimpressed.

char.name: TOMBER
char.dialogue: That is the worst motor ever made.

scene.meta: Suddenly, Tomber narrows his gaze.

char.name: TOMBER
char.dialogue: Wait. That oil filter... those wheel bearings.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Do those parts look familiar, Tomber?

char.name: TOMBER
char.dialogue: They should. I sold them.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: To whom?

char.name: TOMBER
char.dialogue: No idea. He's my best customer, but he always does his business over the phone. I was always wondering why he needs so many parts. Now I know. 68.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, a lemon needs parts. Ain't nothing truer than that.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: "Lemon?"

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Yeah, you know. Cars that don't ever work right. Lemons is a tow truck's bread and butter. Like them Gremlins and Pacers we run into at the party and the race and the airport.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Holley, pull up the pictures from the oil platform. I want to know what other type of cars were out there.

scene.meta: Holley complies and suddenly PHOTOS OF CARS FROM THE OIL PLATFORM hang suspended in the air in front of them.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Right. Let's see. There were Hugos. And Trunkovs.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Mater, are these cars considered lemons?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Is the Popemobile Catholic?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Finn. Everyone involved in this plot is one of history's biggest loser cars.

scene.meta: Holley refers to the ENGINE PHOTO, which now rises forward as the prominent picture, perhaps the only one in view.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: And they're all taking their orders from the car behind this engine.

char.name: TOMBER
char.dialogue: This explains it!

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: What, Tomber? 69.

char.name: TOMBER
char.dialogue: Gremlin, Pacer, Hugo and Trunkovs never get together. But they're having a secret meeting in two days.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Where's this meeting taking place?

char.name: TOMBER
char.dialogue: Porto Corsa, Italy.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: That's where the next race is!

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Then there's a good chance our mystery engine will be there too.

char.name: TOMBER
char.dialogue: Your chances are more than good. I just sent him a new clutch assembly yesterday... to Porto Corsa.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Holley, contact Stephenson and have him meet us at Gare de Lyon. Good work.

scene.meta: STEPHENSON, a THREE-CAR LUXURY BULLET TRAIN speeds along a snow-covered mountain in the dead of night, its halogen headlight cutting through the darkness. It DIPS into a

char.name: MATER (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Boy, I'll tell you what. That three- wheeled feller had to be right about a big meeting.

scene.meta: Mater, Finn and Holley scroll through surveillance-style photos of TRAFFIC on an Italian street. They're in the front train car, which doubles as a luxury seating area and intelligence command center.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You never see this many lemons in one town. Unless there's a swap meet, or something. 70.

scene.meta: (MORE)

char.name: MATER (CONT'D)
char.dialogue: Hey, how'd you get all them pictures?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Well, I remotely reprogrammed Porto Corsa's red light cameras to do recognition scans.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Wow, not only is you the prettiest car I ever met, but you the smartest too.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Thank you. I think.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: That's a familiar sight.

scene.meta: Mater refers to a photo of VICTOR HUGO, the HUGO Lemonhead, being towed by an EASTERN EUROPEAN TOW TRUCK.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: A Hugo being towed. But he looks absolutely perfect.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Of course. They must be the heads of the lemon families.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Makes sense. If I was rich and broke down every day, I'd hire me to tow me around all the time too.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: We've got to infiltrate that meeting. It's the only way to find out who's behind all this.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Hang on a minute.

scene.meta: (EYEING MATER)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: What?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Hold still.

scene.meta: Holley SNAPS Mater's picture, temporarily blinding him.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Ahh! 71.

scene.meta: Holley turns back to her monitor. Mater's face appears on screen. She quickly GRAFTS it over the Hugo's tow truck's.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Good job, Miss Shiftwell.

scene.meta: Holley isn't sure what surprises her more: the compliment or how pleased it makes her.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Thank you, Finn.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Boy, I sure wish my friends could see me now.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SMALL TOWN - ITALY - OUTSIDE PORTO CORSA - DAY
scene.meta: A quaint Italian piazza. A pristine MASERATI FOUNTAIN, complete with ancient trident, looms in our view. Luigi and Guido roll into view.

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: Guido, your eyes do not deceive you. We are in Italy. We are home!

scene.meta: Sarge, Fillmore and McQueen exit a WGP transport truck.

char.name: FILLMORE
char.dialogue: Hey, Luigi. Which way to the hotel, man?

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: What? No friends of mine will stay in a hotel in my village. You will stay with my --- Uncle Topolino!

scene.meta: A festive homecoming party. Lights strung across the square. Music and dancing. Fillmore and Sarge are at a dining table.

char.name: SARGE
char.dialogue: How do they do it? These are the same ingredients as back home, but it tastes so good. 72.

char.name: FILLMORE
char.dialogue: It's organic, man.

char.name: SARGE
char.dialogue: Tree hugger.

scene.meta: LIGHTNING MCQUEEN rolls along the periphery of the square, seems lost in thought.

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Race car.

scene.meta: Uncle Topolino beckons McQueen over.

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: You look so down, so low. Is like you have flat tires.

scene.meta: MAMA TOPOLINO, a hefty Italian grandmother pipes up, a mile a minute then drives off, now a car on a mission.

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: She said you look like you're starving. That she's going to make you a big meal, and fatten you up.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: No, Mama Topolino, please. You don't need to make a fuss!

scene.meta: Too late. She's disappeared inside her kitchen.

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: Capisco. I understand. Is a problem, yes? Between you and a friend?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: How'd you know that?

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: A wise car hears one word and understands two.

scene.meta: McQueen takes this in, impressed.

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: That, and Luigi told me. While Mama cooks, come and take a stroll with me.

scene.meta: They amble forward, Uncle Topolino setting the pace. 73.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I brought my friend Mater along on the trip. And I told him he needed to act different, that we weren't in Radiator Springs.

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: This Mater. He's a close friend?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: He's my best friend.

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: Then why would you ask him to be someone else?

scene.meta: McQueen considers this - a realization.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: What did I do? I said some things during our fight...

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: You know, back when Guido and Luigi used to work for me, they would fight over everything.

scene.meta: IN THE SQUARE - Guido dances with a girl. Luigi suddenly CUTS IN. They begin to ARGUE.

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: They fight over what Ferrari was the best Ferrari; which one of them look more like a Ferrari... There were even some non-Ferrari fights.

scene.meta: Guido now LIFTS Luigi, cuts BACK in.

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: So I tell them, va bene. It's okay to fight. Everybody fights now and then, especially best friends.

scene.meta: McQueen takes this in. Seems to take some small comfort.

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: But you gotta make up fast.

scene.meta: McQueen's comfort quickly evaporates.

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: No fight more important than friendship. 74.

scene.meta: Guido and Luigi now dance together with the girl and her friend who has just arrived. All having a great time. They dance past us, crossing in front of MCQUEEN AND UNCLE TOPOLINO. We STAY WITH them.

char.name: UNCLE TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: Chi trova un'amico, trova un tesoro.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: What does that mean?

char.name: MAMA TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: Whoever find a friend, find a treasure.

scene.meta: (ARRIVING) Mama Topolino drops a tray of food in front of McQueen.

char.name: MAMA TOPOLINO
char.dialogue: Now, mangia! Eat!

scene.meta: Stephenson glides along, all business.

char.name: STEPHENSON
char.dialogue: Finn, one hour to Porto Corsa.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Thank you, Stephenson.

scene.meta: Finn watches as HOLLEY attaches a new EMERGENCY LIGHT on Mater's roof. It looks exactly like his old one.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: That should just about do it.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Perfect.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: So Mater, it's voice-activated. But you know, everything's voice- activated these days. 75.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: What? I thought you was supposed to be making me a disguise.

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Voice recognized. Disguise Program Initiated.

scene.meta: ZWWWWAT! A HOLOGRAPHIC disguise suddenly umbrellas out, emitted from Mater's roof. It drops a clean cloaking image of the EASTERN EUROPEAN TOW TRUCK over Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Cool! Hey, computer. Make me a German truck!

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Request acknowledged.

scene.meta: ZWATTTT! Mater suddenly wears lederhosen and a German hat.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Check it out. I'm wearing Materhosen. Make me a monster truck!

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Request acknowledged.

scene.meta: He's transformed into Dracula, complete with fangs.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I vant to siphon your gas. Now make me a taco truck!

scene.meta: (ALA DRACULA)

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Request acknowledged.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: A funny car!

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Request acknowledged.

scene.meta: Finn suddenly pushes a button, stops the madness.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: The idea is to keep a low profile, Mater.

scene.meta: Mater, chastened, moves on. 76.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: So I just go in, pretend to be this truck.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: And leave the rest to us.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Now hold still.

scene.meta: Holley turns back to her work. The disguise's cloaking is larger than Mater. As a result, Holley must dial it back to fit his body. As she carefully calibrates the hologram:

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: I have to do the final fitting on your disguise.

scene.meta: Holley STOPS. The 3D disguise is now flush with his frame, but dents SHOW THROUGH.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Oh dear. That's no good.

scene.meta: She deploys A BONDO SPRAYER on a robotic arm, moves it toward one of Mater's DENTS. Mater pulls away.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, what are you doing?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: The disguise won't calibrate effectively without a smooth surface to graft onto.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Oh. For a second there I thought you was trying to fix my dents.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: I was.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well then no thank you. I don't get them dents buffed, pulled, filled or painted by nobody. They're way too valuable.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Your dents are valuable?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I come by each one of them with my best friend Lightning McQueen. 77.

scene.meta: (MORE)

char.name: MATER (CONT'D)
char.dialogue: I don't fix these. I want to remember these dents forever.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: So you were being serious in Paris? McQueen isn't just part of your cover?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Friendships can be dangerous in our line of work, Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: But my line of work is towing and salvage.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Right. And Miss Shiftwell's is designing iPhone apps.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: No, I meant for real. I ---

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: It's okay. Say no more. I'll work around the dent.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: In the meantime...

scene.meta: Finn hits a button. The walls transform into a MASSIVE

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: You look a little light on weapons.

scene.meta: --- STEPHENSON EMERGES LOUDLY from a tunnel. He powers forward, starts his descent into Italy ---

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: You are looking live at beautiful Porto Corsa, Italy, on the Italian Riviera. What a magnificent setting for the second race of the World Grand Prix.

scene.meta: Over sweeping helicopter BEAUTY SHOTS: 78.

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Well Brent, they call this place "The Gem of the Riviera," and it's easy to see why.

scene.meta: A local fishing boat chugs through an idyllic waterway, beneath bridges that connect hillside villas.

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: With its secluded beaches and opulent casinos, Porto Corsa truly is a playground for the wealthy.

scene.meta: A long line of RICH-LOOKING YACHTS in the harbor.

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: And everyone who's anyone is here today.

scene.meta: Rich SPORTS CARS drive past pricey shops.

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: From the ultra-rich and super- famous, to world leaders and important dignitaries.

scene.meta: THE POPEMOBILE, visible in a crowd, drives through town.

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: You aren't kidding, David. You can't do a three-point turn around here without bumping into some celebrity!

scene.meta: HELICOPTER SHOT of the Casino.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Welcome everyone to the second race of the World Grand Prix! CUT TO:

scene.meta: MUSTANGBURGER, HOBBSCAP and CARTRIP in the control booth.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER
char.dialogue: The big news continues to be Allinol. Sir Miles Axlerod spoke to the press earlier today to answer questions about its safety.

scene.meta: FOOTAGE OF THE PRESS CONFERENCE - Miles Axlerod, at a podium, addresses the press throng. He looks a bit exasperated. 79.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: An independent panel of scientists has determined that Allinol is completely safe. Okay? Safe! There it is.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER
char.dialogue: So the race will go on, folks.

scene.meta: RACE GRAPHICS show Francesco with 10 points at the top of the race standings.

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP
char.dialogue: But the question everyone is asking: Will the real Lightning McQueen show up today?

scene.meta: ON THE TRACK - As the racers begin to get into position on the grid.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Well, he better. Talk about a home- track advantage. Francesco Bernoulli grew up racing on this course.

char.name: ITALIAN TRACK ANNOUNCER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Signore e signori, in the pole position, numero uno...

scene.meta: The crowd is cheering already, knows who this is.

char.name: ITALIAN TRACK ANNOUNCER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: ... Francescoooooo!

scene.meta: The Italian crowd roars and chants for their hometown hero.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Bellissima! Thank you for your support. And your big mistake, McQueen!

scene.meta: (TO MCQUEEN) McQueen missed this comment. He approaches his grid position, lost in thought.

char.name: ITALIAN TRACK ANNOUNCER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: In the secondo position. Numero novantacinque. Lightning McQueen!

scene.meta: Cheers (not so thunderous, obviously) from the crowd. McQueen doesn't seem to notice. 80. IN MCQUEEN'S PIT - His team exchanges looks, worried.

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: McQueen? Is everything okay?

char.name: FILLMORE
char.dialogue: If you're worried about your fuel, man, don't. It's perfectly safe.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: No, guys, I just really wish Mater were here.

char.name: FRANCESCO (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Francesco understands, McQueen.

scene.meta: Francesco parks next to him, grinning.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Oh, great. Here it comes. What've you got, Francesco?

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: For famous race cars like Francesco and well... you, to be far away from home is not easy.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I think you forgot the insulting part of that insult.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Is no insult. When Francesco is away from home, he misses his mama just like you miss your tow truck amico.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Gee, I maybe misjudged you, because that's exactly how I ---

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Of course, I am at home. And my mama is right here.

scene.meta: Francesco refers to his MAMA who sits in a special box in the crowd, cheering him on, blowing him kisses.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Mama! Don't worry, Mama! 81.

scene.meta: (MORE)

char.name: FRANCESCO (CONT'D)
char.dialogue: McQueen is very sad! I will beat his cry-baby bottom today!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: And there's the insult we were missing. Grazie!

char.name: THE LIGHTS - CLICK FROM RED TO GREEN ---

scene.meta: A group of thuggish HUGOS - ugly Eastern European cars - wait impatiently at the front. A LIMOUSINE-STYLE car carrier rolls up to the roundabout. An esteemed, elderly GREMLIN rolls past with a group of GREMLIN THUGS who usher him into the casino.

char.name: ALEXANDER HUGO
char.dialogue: Gremlins. Man, those are some ugly cars. Look like someone stole their trunks.

scene.meta: The THUGS all SNICKER.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Scusatemi, tutti! Signori!

scene.meta: Holley arrives, sporting a decent Italian accent.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Mio nonno, my grandfather, has broken down. If one of you would help I would be so thankful.

scene.meta: IVAN, AN EASTERN EUROPEAN TOW TRUCK (the one Holley and Finn prepped Mater to impersonate), drives forward.

char.name: IVAN THE TOW TRUCK
char.dialogue: Sounds like you need some "roadside assistance".

char.name: ANOTHER HUGO
char.dialogue: She was talking to me, Ivan. 82.

char.name: IVAN THE TOW TRUCK
char.dialogue: Oh really? Prove it.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: No, no, don't fight over me.

scene.meta: Holley directs her interest toward Ivan.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Signore Tow Truck, per favore? CUT TO:

scene.meta: MATER - He watches this from a safe hiding spot around a corner.

char.name: FINN (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Get ready, Mater. CUT TO:

scene.meta: FINN, at an outdoor cafe on the casino grounds.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: You're on any moment now. CUT BACK TO:

scene.meta: MATER, now looking a bit nervous. He backs out of sight.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I don't know about this, Finn. What if I screw things up?

char.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: Impossible. Just apply the same level of dedication you've been using to play the "idiot tow truck" and you'll be fine.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: It's just that them guys look pretty tough and --- Wait, did you say "idiot"? Is that how you see me?

char.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: That's how everyone sees you. Isn't that the idea? I tell you, that's the genius of it. No one realizes they're being fooled because they're too busy laughing at the fool. Brilliant.

scene.meta: While Finn talks, Mater takes this in. He catches his own reflection in a nearby window. Seems to be seeing himself with new eyes. 83. ZZZZATTT! Mater jumps at the sound, turns in time to see Ivan SHOCKED UNCONSCIOUS by Holley's ZAPPERS.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Why aren't you in disguise?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I, uh---

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Come on, there's no time. Go!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Okay, okay. Computer: disguise.

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Request acknowledged.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. AROUND THE NEXT CORNER - CONTINUOUS
scene.meta: Mater, now disguised as Ivan the Tow Truck, approaches the Hugos. Another LIMO CAR CARRIER arrives.

char.name: ALEXANDER HUGO
char.dialogue: It's the boss! He is coming!

scene.meta: The carrier parks and the back opens. VICTOR HUGO waits.

char.name: VICTOR HUGO
char.dialogue: Ivan!

scene.meta: Mater realizes Victor is talking to him. He hops to it.

char.name: VICTOR HUGO
char.dialogue: Ivan, why do you insult me so by making me wait?

scene.meta: Mater, now with Victor hooked, tows him in the front doors of the casino. ON FINN - now joined in the cafe by Holley who monitors everything and SEES EVERYTHING MATER SEES on her display.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: He's in.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. RACE COURSE - PORTO CORSA - DAY
scene.meta: McQueen and Francesco battle for first place ---

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: The racers are now making their way around the hairpin, and headed downhill toward the casino bridge. 84.

scene.meta: Cars play craps with FUZZY DICE; slot machines with odometers for jackpot numbers; cigarette girls sell car items.

char.name: CIGARETTE GIRL CAR
char.dialogue: Air Freshener, antenna balls, sparkplugs...

scene.meta: ON MATER - He tows VICTOR. They are flanked on all four corners by Hugo thugs, ala a presidential motorcade. The largess of the interior design seems to finally snap Mater out of his funk.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Wow, this place looks like it's made out of gold.

scene.meta: (WIDE-EYED) The Hugos on either side of Mater exchange a look.

char.name: HOLLEY (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: That's because it is, Mater. Now, be careful what you say.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Why is that? What do you mean don't talk to you? So you want me to stop talking to you. Right now?

scene.meta: which we cannot hear)

char.name: ALEXANDER HUGO
char.dialogue: You are acting strange today, Ivan.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I have no idea what you're talking about...

scene.meta: MATER'S P.O.V. - A digital readout isolates the Hugo and starts to scroll reams of information alongside.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: ...Alexander Hugo, aka "Chop Shop Alex."

scene.meta: IN A WIDER SHOT we realize this display is invisible to all but Mater. Some of Alex's other alias' include "Alexander Hu- Don't Go" and "Alexander the Not-So Great." 85.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, you got a lot of aka's, Alex. But I guess that makes sense seeings how you's wanted in France, Germany, the Czech Republic...

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Mater! Stop it!

scene.meta: DISPLAY) Alexander Hugo, unaware of Holley's interruption, whispers to Mater as they turn a corner.

char.name: ALEXANDER HUGO
char.dialogue: Okay, okay. Keep your voice down. You're gonna make me arrested. Don't mess with Ivan today. He's in a bad mood.

scene.meta: Holley, hearing this, can't believe it.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: He's so good.

scene.meta: Mater tows Victor inside a private room, where inside are the WORLD'S WORST CARS including VLADMIR TRUNKOV, TUBBS PACER and

char.name: VLADIMIR TRUNKOV
char.dialogue: Victor!

char.name: TUBBS PACER
char.dialogue: Hey, Victor!

char.name: J. CURBY GREMLIN
char.dialogue: There you are.

char.name: VLADIMIR TRUNKOV
char.dialogue: Come in, come in.

char.name: J. CURBY GREMLIN
char.dialogue: Victor Hugo. I'm J. Curby Gremlin, from Detroit. It's good to see you. Now we can start.

char.name: VICTOR HUGO
char.dialogue: Is the big boss here yet? 86.

char.name: VLADIMIR TRUNKOV
char.dialogue: No, not yet.

char.name: TUBBS PACER
char.dialogue: He's supposed to be here any minute.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Here we go.

scene.meta: A car finally appears. It's Zundapp.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Guten Tag!

scene.meta: Everyone looks disappointed.

char.name: TUBBS PACER
char.dialogue: It's just the Professor.

char.name: VICTOR HUGO
char.dialogue: Zundapp, when is he coming?

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: He's already here.

scene.meta: MONITORS descend from the ceiling. On them, an image of AN ENGINE - the same bloody engine from the photo. But this is a LIVE image. The car is being worked on.

char.name: VOICE
char.dialogue: Welcome, everyone.

scene.meta: The VOICE is garbled, scrambled. No way to determine who.

char.name: ENGINE VOICE
char.dialogue: I wish I could be with you on this very special day but... my clutch assembly broke. You know how it is.

scene.meta: The Lemons all nod in understanding. 87.

char.name: TUBBS PACER
char.dialogue: Been there.

char.name: J. CURBY GREMLIN
char.dialogue: Forget about it.

char.name: VLADIMIR TRUNKOV
char.dialogue: We know how you feel.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Descramble that voice!

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: I'm trying... It's too sophisticated!

char.name: ENGINE VOICE
char.dialogue: We are here to celebrate. Today all your hard work pays off. The world turned their backs on cars like us. They stopped manufacturing us, stopped making our parts. The only thing they haven't stopped doing is laughing at us. They've called us terrible names...

scene.meta: On VICTOR HUGO.

char.name: ENGINE VOICE
char.dialogue: Jalopy. Rustbucket.

scene.meta: On TUBBS PACER.

char.name: ENGINE VOICE
char.dialogue: Heap. Clunker.

scene.meta: On J. CURBY GREMLIN:

char.name: ENGINE VOICE
char.dialogue: Junker, beater, wreck.

scene.meta: On ZUNDAPP.

char.name: ENGINE VOICE
char.dialogue: Rattletrap.

scene.meta: And finally back on the monitor. The ENGINE. 88.

char.name: ENGINE VOICE
char.dialogue: Lemon. But their insults just give us strength. Because today, my friends...

scene.meta: The monitors switch to LIVE RACE FOOTAGE.

char.name: ENGINE VOICE
char.dialogue: ...that all ends.

scene.meta: Veloso swerves, attempts to mitigate a crash ---

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: There's smoke! On the casino bridge!

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Oh no.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: It's Carla Veloso, the Brazilian race car.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: What just happened?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: I'm working on it.

scene.meta: The lemons are CHEERING. Mater is freaked out.

char.name: ENGINE VOICE
char.dialogue: They laughed at us. But now it's our turn to laugh back.

scene.meta: As the racer smashes into the railing --- 89.

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Another crash! It's number nine, Nigel Gearsley.

char.name: ENGINE VOICE (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Embrace your inner lemon! Let it drive you!

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Holley?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: I'm detecting an extremely strong electromagnetic pulse.

scene.meta: Holley replays that last crash. The OUTLINE OF THE BEAM is seen hitting the racer. Holley TRACES THIS to its source --- --- a WGP CAMERA, which Grem and Acer have pointed at the racers from a tower position.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Finn, it's the camera!

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Where?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: On the tower.

scene.meta: Finn TAKES OFF, speeding toward Grem and Acer ---

char.name: ENGINE VOICE (V.O.)
char.dialogue: This was meant to be alternative fuel's greatest moment.

scene.meta: Angry fans knock over cans of Allinol. One drives over an Allinol sign. They're fed up with it.

char.name: ENGINE VOICE (V.O.)
char.dialogue: After today everyone will race back to gasoline.

scene.meta: The video screens are now filled with ONE IMAGE - of the OIL PLATFORMS in the Pacific from the beginning of the movie. 90.

char.name: ENGINE VOICE
char.dialogue: And we, the owners of the world's largest untapped oil reserve, will become the most powerful cars in the world!

scene.sceneheader: EXT. STREETS OF PORTO CORSA - CONTINUOUS
scene.meta: Finn ducks, weaves, speeds, and pushes his way through

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Get out of the way! Andate!

scene.sceneheader: EXT. RACE COURSE - PORTO CORSA - CONTINUOUS

char.name: ENGINE VOICE
char.dialogue: They will come to us and they will have no choice, `cause they will need us.

scene.meta: ON FINN - He SPEEDS up a road, Grem and Acer visible ahead of him. He LEAPS over the crevasse toward the AMC cousins --- Suddenly, FINN FREEZES. He's immobilized in mid-air! He looks up. A CHOPPER with a LARGE MAGNET hovers over him.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: We figured you might stop by.

scene.meta: (TO FINN)

char.name: ENGINE VOICE (V.O.)
char.dialogue: And they will finally respect us. So hold your hoods high. After today you will never again be ashamed of who you are!

scene.meta: Grem and Acer turn back to the camera. They line up Shu Todoroki, who's a bit further along now.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: No!

char.name: ENGINE VOICE
char.dialogue: Long live Lemons! 91.

scene.meta: Grem ZAPS THE RACER. Flames burst from Todoroki. He loses control.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Number seven is loose! Shu Todoroki!

scene.meta: Holley sees Finn being flown away by the chopper.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Finn.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. FINISH LINE - PORTO CORSA - CONTINUOUS

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Bumper to bumper as they approach the finish line.

scene.meta: McQueen NOSES out Francesco for a win, both oblivious to what's just happened.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: McQueen's the winner, Francesco's second. And they have no idea what happened behind them.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Yeah!

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Dah! This is impossible!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: That's what I'm talking about. Kachow! Hey, where are all the other cars?

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: What is going on?

scene.meta: They see the pile-up from an overhead monitor. Sirens blare as a MEDIC CHOPPER flies to the scene of the pile-up. 92.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Oh no. CUT TO:

scene.meta: (REALIZES) MILES AXLEROD - LATER. He's near the casino. He's completely surrounded, 360 degrees, by press. He's drowned out by a blizzard of questions.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER
char.dialogue: Sir Axlerod! Is the final race in London still going to take place?

scene.meta: PULL BACK to reveal we are watching this on monitors in the PRIVATE CASINO ROOM with the Lemonheads, Zundapp and Mater.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD (ON TV)
char.dialogue: I suppose that... Look, "the show must go on" as they say. But now is not the time to talk about...

char.name: J. CURBY GREMLIN
char.dialogue: I can't believe this is really happening.

char.name: VLADIMIR TRUNKOV
char.dialogue: Shh, quiet!

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (ON TV)
char.dialogue: And Allinol? Will you require all the racers to still run on Allinol?

char.name: VLADIMIR TRUNKOV
char.dialogue: Here it comes.

scene.meta: On Miles Axlerod: He's devastated.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD (ON TV)
char.dialogue: I cannot in good conscience continue to risk the lives of any more race cars. The final race will not be run on Allinol.

scene.meta: WILD WHOOPING CHEERS fill the room. Lemonade corks are popped.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (ON TV)
char.dialogue: There you have it. A clearly devastated Sir Miles Axlerod announcing that he will not require the cars to use Allinol for the final race. 93.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: A toast! To the death of Allinol and alternative fuel forever!

scene.meta: Holley is already on the run. Speeding away.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Mater. Abort the mission. They've got Finn. Get out of there. Get out of there right now!

scene.meta: She turns a corner and STOPS. Her escape is now blocked by the same HUGO THUGS she tricked before. Another vehicle appears BEHIND HER, LOOMS.

char.name: IVAN THE TOW TRUCK
char.dialogue: How is your grandfather?

scene.meta: The Lemonheads celebrate, chant "Long live lemons!" Mater, scared, turns to leave. He's stopped by ALEXANDER HUGO.

char.name: ALEXANDER HUGO
char.dialogue: Isn't this a great party, Ivan?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Oh yeah, it's unbelievable.

char.name: ALEXANDER HUGO
char.dialogue: You are not leaving, are you?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Uh, of course I ain't leavin'.

char.name: MCQUEEN (O.S.)
char.dialogue: I'm just in shock like everybody...

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: McQueen?

scene.meta: He turns, sees that McQueen is being interviewed on the monitors.

char.name: MCQUEEN (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Crashes are part of racing, I know. But something like that shouldn't ever happen. 94.

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP (ON TV)
char.dialogue: They're letting you choose your fuel for the final race. Do you have any idea what it's going to be?

char.name: MCQUEEN (ON TV)
char.dialogue: Allinol.

scene.meta: The excitement suddenly DRAINS from the room.

char.name: LEMONHEADS
char.dialogue: - What?! - Did he just say Allinol? After today?

char.name: MCQUEEN (ON TV)
char.dialogue: My friend Fillmore says the fuel's safe. That's good enough for me. I didn't stand by a friend of mine recently. I'm not gonna make the same mistake twice.

scene.meta: On Mater. He takes this in.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (ON TV)
char.dialogue: So a surprising revelation from Lightning McQueen...

scene.meta: Zundapp is already on the phone with their Big Boss who, based on his angry O.S. voice, sounds ticked off.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Yes, sir. Of course.

scene.meta: Zundapp hangs up, turns to the room.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Allinol must be finished for good. McQueen cannot win the last race. Lightning McQueen must be killed.

scene.meta: Mater's eyes open wide.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: No!

scene.meta: Mater backs up, KNOCKING his emergency light against one of the monitors. ZZZZZAT! His holographic disguise flickers away then quickly SCROLLS THROUGH all of his previous disguises, finally revealing rusty old Mater.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: It's the American spy! 95.

scene.meta: The thugs DRAW TERRIFYING WEAPONS.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Dadgum.

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: "Gatling gun" request acknowledged.

scene.meta: WHIRRRRR! GUNS roll out of Mater on each side.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Shoot. I didn't mean ---

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Request acknowledged.

scene.meta: Mater SPRAYS BULLETS into the crowd.

char.name: VLADIMIR TRUNKOV
char.dialogue: Get down!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Whoa!!

scene.meta: The Lemons and Lemonheads hit the deck and RETURN FIRE --- Mater is THROWN BACKWARD by the force of the guns, back through some double doors and onto a BALCONY.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Wait wait! I didn't mean that kind of shoot!

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Correction acknowledged. Deploying chute.

scene.meta: WHOOM! A PARACHUTE BURSTS out of the back of Mater, he catches air and is YANKED INTO THE SKY! The Lemonheads watch him float away, amazed. ON MATER, out of the frying pan but still toasty. He looks around, notices: LIGHTNING MCQUEEN, far away, leaving the press podium.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: McQueen!

scene.meta: Mater looks down at the harbor, over which he flies. He spots a MOTORBOAT. Mater WHIPS his hook down, steals a ride behind the boat TOWARD MCQUEEN. 96.

char.name: ITALIAN MOTORBOAT
char.dialogue: Aspetti!

scene.meta: --- a barricade. Separating the press from the public, ITALIAN SECURITY TRUCKS stand guard.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Lemme through! Lemme through!

scene.meta: MATER barrels around a corner. He's now covered in Francesco memorabilia and palm leaves. The word `HOT' now dangles off him like the world's biggest bling. He looks INSANE.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You gotta let me in! I gotta get through to warn McQueen!

scene.meta: (TO SECURITY) Security eyes one another. This is serious.

char.name: ITALIAN SECURITY #1
char.dialogue: You cannot come through here. Back up, signore.

char.name: ITALIAN SECURITY #2
char.dialogue: We have a lunatic at Gate Nove.

scene.meta: (into a walkie-talkie)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: No, listen! I was disguised as a tow truck to infiltrate this Lemonhead meeting and my weapons system misinterperated what I was SAYING ---

char.name: ITALIAN SECURITY #2
char.dialogue: I repeat. Lunatic at Gate Nove.

scene.meta: Mater spots McQueen far off in the distance.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: McQueen! McQueen!

scene.meta: JUST OFF THE PRESS STAGE - McQueen is led toward the exit.

char.name: PRESS LIAISON
char.dialogue: Right this way, signore. 97.

char.name: MATER (O.S.)
char.dialogue: McQueen!

scene.meta: (DISTANT)

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater?

scene.meta: McQueen looks up but can only see A SEA OF VEHICLES, flashbulbs, cameras, TV trucks with those tall satellite antennae things that spindle toward the sky... BACK AT THE SECURITY BARRICADE - Mater, like a nimble running back, dances around to avoid capture by security.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: McQueen!

char.name: ITALIAN SECURITY #1
char.dialogue: Back up, sir. Stop moving! Stop!

scene.meta: Mater head fakes them and pushes through, into the crowd ---

char.name: ITALIAN SECURITY #1
char.dialogue: Oy! Stop! Ferma li!

scene.meta: IN THE CROWD - Mater shoves his way through. He's still far in the back.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: McQueen!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: That really sounded like Mater. Mater?

char.name: PRESS LIAISON
char.dialogue: Signore...

scene.meta: (TO MCQUEEN) ON MATER, getting CLOSER...

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: McQueen, they're gonna kill you!!

scene.meta: ON MCQUEEN - Okay, he's positive that was his friend, but where is he?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater?!

scene.meta: McQueen spots a TOW HOOK, moving through the crowd toward him, "Jaws"-like. 98.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Excuse me.

scene.meta: McQueen disappears into the press crowd.

char.name: PRESS LIAISON
char.dialogue: No, no, where are you going? Please, Mr. McQueen!

scene.meta: McQueen pushes through the press.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Scusi. Mater! Scusi...

scene.meta: McQueen tracks the tow hook, gets closer. He pushes through the last few vehicles ---

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, I'm so glad to see you. I'm so sorr ---

scene.meta: It's NOT MATER. It's IVAN, the Hugo Thug's tow truck.

char.name: IVAN THE TOW TRUCK
char.dialogue: Lightning McQueen! I am a huge fan.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry. I thought I heard---

scene.meta: (CONFUSED)

char.name: IVAN THE TOW TRUCK
char.dialogue: Yes, but that was me. I said, "You killed out there today." You're the best.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: What? Oh. I mean, thanks.

char.name: PRESS LIAISON
char.dialogue: Right this way, signore ---

scene.meta: Now the Press Liaison and his assistants are pushing McQueen back in the other direction ---

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I really thought I heard my friend.

scene.meta: (as he's pulled away) As he's pulled away, press and onlookers start to come between him and Ivan, who hasn't moved. 99.

char.name: IVAN THE TOW TRUCK
char.dialogue: In England you'll be finished. At the finish line.

scene.meta: (TO MCQUEEN) Ivan is now obscured again.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Wait, what?

scene.meta: The ITALIAN PRESS being to swarm.

char.name: PRESS LIAISON
char.dialogue: Please, the world press is waiting. You come with me, please.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. STREET - PORTO CORSA - MOMENTS LATER
scene.meta: --- just as Mater, now BOUND and with HIS MOUTH TAPED, is pulled away and thrown into the back of a transport vehicle. He lands hard on his side, spits out his TAPE.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Let me go!

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: You actually care about that race car. A pity you didn't warn him in time.

scene.meta: As the doors close on Mater --- PHHHHHSSSSSSTTTTTTT! A thick, noxious gas starts to fill the truck. On MATER as the knockout gas works its magic. HIS EYES CLOSE. CUT TO:

char.name: MATER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Idiot? Is that how you see me?

char.name: FINN (V.O.)
char.dialogue: That's how everyone sees you. I tell you, that's the genius of it.

scene.meta: FADE IN on Mater, back at the Casino, eyeing his reflection in the glass window. It's the same moment from before except now we are watching it from a DETACHED, FLOATING PERSPECTIVE.

char.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: No one realizes they're being fooled because they're too busy laughing at the fool.

scene.meta: - IN THE KABUKI THEATER IN JAPAN - Again, from before. Mater makes a spectacle of himself, WHOOPING AND HOLLERING in the stands with the face paint on.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Domo arigato!

scene.meta: McQueen, Fillmore, Guido, Luigi, Sarge and patrons eye Mater, embarrassed and angry. - IN THE JAPANESE MUSEUM - The moment of Mater banging on the Zen rock garden's glass. Except that now we see all sorts of disappointed and eyebrow raising reactions.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You done good! You got all the leaves!

char.name: JEFF GORVETTE
char.dialogue: Check out that tow truck.

char.name: LEWIS HAMILTON
char.dialogue: I wonder who that guy's with?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Will you guys excuse me just for one little second?

scene.meta: (HUMILIATED) We now REVEAL that this FLOATING, THIRD PERSON PERSPECTIVE is MATER. He's INSIDE his past, watching it from others' points of view. He doesn't like what he sees. - ON MATER, now at the sushi bar.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Now that's a scoop of ice cream!

scene.meta: Mater swallows the wasabi with one big bite. He SCREAMS! The sushi bar patrons blanch with revulsion at his wail. - ON THE FOUNTAIN, as Mater peels into full view of everyone else at the party. As Mater laps up water from a fountain:

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater?! 101.

scene.meta: (EMBARRASSED) ALL THE RACERS, with FRANCESCO front and center, guffaw at Mater. - On MCQUEEN, now scolding Mater moments later.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I never leak oil. Never.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, you have to get a hold of yourself. You're making a scene!

scene.meta: - IN MCQUEEN'S PIT GARAGE, after the Japanese race.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Wait a minute. I didn't screw you up, did I?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I lost the race because of you!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Maybe if I talked to somebody, or---

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I don't need your help. I don't want your help!

scene.meta: - Now BACK AT THE PARTY, a moment we didn't see before but which presumably happened. Mater is BANGING a ceremonial GONG, to the horror of Japanese guests.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Bang a gong, get it on!

scene.meta: GONNNNNNG!!! --- On the PARTYGOERS, RACE CARS, PARTY STAFF - they're all laughing at Mater as McQueen's final words blend in, making a

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Listen, this isn't Radiator Springs. This is exactly why I don't bring you along to these things!

scene.meta: --- to the GONG of a CLOCK. CLOSE ON MATER as he OPENS HIS EYES.
All around him, all he sees are GIANT PIECES OF MECHANIZED
HOLLEY and FINN are here too, strapped bumper to bumper in the divots of large clock movements.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Holley! Finn! Where are we?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: We're in London, Mater. Inside Big Bentley.

scene.meta: Suddenly Mater DROPS QUICKLY down toward --- --- whirring, scary machinery.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Woaaaah! ---

scene.meta: WHAP! The chain yanks to a STOP. Mater, instead of being 30 feet from death, is now 20. Finn and Holley are only a few clicks closer to being crushed themselves. The clock ticks to 3:01.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: This... this is all my fault.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Don't be a fool, Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: But I am, remember? You said so.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: When did I... Oh. Mater, I was complimenting you on what a good spy you are.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I'm not a spy!

scene.meta: This echoes throughout the clock.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I've been trying to tell you that the whole time. I really am just a tow truck.

scene.meta: Finn and Holley take this in.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Finn, he's not joking.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: I know.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You were right, Finn. I'm a fool. And what's happened to McQueen is `cause I'm such a big one. This is all my fault.

scene.meta: GREM and ACER arrive on a lift, roll into view on a catwalk.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Good, you're up!

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: And just in time!

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Professor Z wanted you to have a front row seat for the death of Lightning McQueen.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: He's still alive?

scene.meta: (HOPEFUL) Acer whips a sheet away, revealing the WGP CAMERA, turns it toward the clock face.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: Not for much longer.

scene.meta: Big Bentley's big hand CLICKS ahead another minute. But we're a bit farther away from it than before.

char.name: SALLY (O.S.)
char.dialogue: We came as soon as you called. 104.

scene.meta: Sally, flanked by Red, Flo and Ramone, are in front of ---- --- McQueen and the rest of the team.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I called to talk to Mater. It never occurred to me that he wouldn't be there.

char.name: RAMONE
char.dialogue: Sheriff is talking to Scotland Yard right now.

scene.meta: FLO And Sarge is in touch with his friends in the British military.

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: You just need to focus on the race.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I know, but Sal, with everything going on I'm not sure I should---

scene.meta: A HORN O.S. Someone's entering the pit. Everyone parts, revealing MILES AXLEROD.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Sir Axlerod.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: I'm sorry to interrupt.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: No, no, it's all right.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: I just wanted to come down here and personally thank you. Because after Italy, I was finished. And then you gave me one last shot.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Listen, I ---

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: And I probably shouldn't be saying this at all but... I hope you win today. Show the world that they've been wrong about Allinol.

scene.meta: McQueen takes this in. He looks at Sally.

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: Mater would want you to race.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: All right. For Mater.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. THE STARTING GRID - MOMENTS LATER

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Here he comes!

scene.meta: Zundapp suddenly SQUAWKS over the radio.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: What happened!?

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: I don't know, Professor.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: What did you do?

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: I didn't do nothin'. Shh! I'm talking to the Professor---

scene.meta: (TO ACER) They're all talking at once and for a moment we cannot understand what is being said.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: You broke it.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Quiet! I understand, sir. Yes.

scene.meta: (INTO RADIO) Grem hangs up.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: What'd he say?

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: We go to the backup plan.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Backup plan??

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: We snuck a bomb in McQueen's pit!

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: The next time he makes a stop, instead of saying "ka-chow," he's gonna go "ka-boom"!

scene.meta: They LAUGH. Mater shudders, upset.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Don't feel bad, tow truck. You couldn't have saved him.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: Oh, wait. You could have!

scene.meta: Grem and Acer laugh. As they board the elevator:

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Dadgum lemons.

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Request acknowledged.

scene.meta: Suddenly, Mater's GATLING GUNS rotate out again - a surprise to Mater. But they SPIN IN PLACE, empty. Grem and Acer just laugh more.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: What, you didn't think we'd take your bullets?

scene.meta: Mater NOTICES SOMETHING.
CLOSE ON WHAT MATER SEES: A small piece of his ropes have been shaved away by the Gatling. He carefully rotates his guns BACK IN, pretending like he's seen nothing.

char.name: ACER
char.dialogue: That's right! You got nothin'.

char.name: GREM
char.dialogue: Who's the lemon now, huh?

scene.meta: (as the elevator descends) They're GONE.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Nice try, Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Dadgum!

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: REQUEST ACK-

scene.meta: The guns ROTATE OUT AGAIN, SPIN. Mater watches as the spinning barrels SLICE INTO the ropes, do some damage.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Dadgum! Dadgum! Dadgum!

scene.meta: The COMPUTER responds with each "dadgum." The barrels continue to SPIN, CUTTING THROUGH the ropes.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: DADGUMDADGUMDADGUMDADGUM ---

scene.meta: PING! The ropes BREAK AWAY and Mater FALLS --- right toward the whirring machinery!

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Mater!

scene.meta: Mater QUICKLY WHIPS his tow cable around, hooks a pipe and tosses himself to the ramp with a heavy THUD. He doesn't HESITATE:

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I gotta get you all out of there!

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: There's no time. McQueen needs your help, Mater. 108.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: But I can't, I'm just a tow truck.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: It's up to you. Go to the pits and get everyone out. You can do that.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: What about you guys?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: We'll be okay.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Go and get some more dents, Mater.

scene.meta: On Finn and Holley, now closer to death.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: So we'll be "okay"? Really?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: He wouldn't have left if I'd told him the truth. Being killed by a clock. Gives a whole new meaning to "your time has come."

scene.meta: (re: his death trap) At this mention Holley seems to perk up, gets an idea.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Time. That's it!

scene.meta: She spies a GEARBOX below them, at least 20 feet down. Holley
--- but they miss their target. She recoils them back.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: What are you doing?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Trying to turn back time. If I can just reverse the polarity...

scene.meta: She FIRES them again. Direct hit!
Holley JUICES the gearbox with HIGH VOLTAGE. The CLOCK STOPS. It reverses itself. Finn and Holley's wheel now rotates AWAY from danger.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Good job! Quick thinking, Holley!

scene.meta: BIG BENTLEY, visible from street level, now moves BACKWARDS. Fast. CRANE DOWN TO --- --- Mater, speeding toward the track, unaware.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: What's everybody on the wrong side of the road for?!

scene.meta: Finn and Holley are now moving in the opposite direction, toward ANOTHER GEAR! And it's going MUCH FASTER. They're seconds from a crushing death...

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Oh no!

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Drive!

scene.meta: They both DRIVE, fast as they can with FULL FORCE ---

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Burn rubber!!

scene.meta: They drive HARDER, separating bumpers with just enough room for the descending gear to SNAP THEIR ROPES! Their tires spinning, they both LAUNCH off in opposite directions, LAND HARD on opposing platforms. As Finn squeals around to Holley's side of the clock:

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: We've got to get to the course. Calculate the fastest way to ---

scene.meta: Holley pops WINGS out of her side.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Done. 110.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Miss Shiftwell.

scene.meta: (IMPRESSED)

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: They're standard issue now.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: You kids get all the good hardware.

scene.meta: They turn to leave when they STOP, see SOMETHING. It's an AIR FILTER on the ground.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Oh no. That's Mater's.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: I knew his escape was too easy.

scene.sceneheader: INT. PIT ROW - TRACK SIDE - DAY
scene.meta: Mater bursts through the security gate with aplomb, tears through the pits and stops at MCQUEEN'S.

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: Mater!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Everybody get out! Get out now! Y'all gotta get out the pits!

scene.meta: The ENTIRE RADIATOR SPRINGS GANG is here.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Hey, what are you guys doing here?

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: We're here because of you, Mater.

scene.meta: FLO Is everything okay?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: No! Everything's not okay! There's a bomb in here! Y'all gotta get out! Now! 111.

char.name: EVERYONE
char.dialogue: - A bomb? - Huh? - Woah.

char.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
char.dialogue: Mater!

char.name: MATER (INTO RADIO)
char.dialogue: Finn! You're okay!

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Mater, listen to me. The bomb is on you.

scene.meta: ON HIS REARVIEW DISPLAY: We can see that a BOMB has been detected, anchored to Mater's air filter.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: They knew you'd try to help McQueen. When we were knocked out they planted it in your air filter.

scene.meta: Mater SNORTS, blowing his air filter cover off. Cross-eyed, Mater sees the explosive device attached to him. He looks up: An ALLINOL CONTAINER hangs ominously over his head.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Uh-oh.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater! There you are!

scene.meta: Mater turns. McQueen enters Pit Row, 100 yards away and closing in FAST.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Stop right there!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Oh man, I've been so worried about you! CUT TO:

scene.meta: The view of this scene through the window of a luxury box. Reveal Zundapp in the window's reflection. He's watching from inside. He's poised to push a DETONATOR BUTTON. As Zundapp's front tire approaches the detonator ---

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Don't come any closer!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Are you okay?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: No, I'm not okay. Stay away from me!!

scene.meta: Mater PEELS OUT BACKWARDS, out onto the track.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: No, wait. Wait! CUT TO:

scene.meta: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP - He hesitates, can't believe it.

char.name: TV FOOTAGE OF MCQUEEN CHASING MATER
BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Hold everything. A tow truck has just raced onto the track. And he's driving backwards!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, wait!

scene.meta: He breezes right through his pit, goes after Mater.

char.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Normally an emergency vehicle on the track means there's been an accident.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: Wait, wait. Lightning McQueen is chasing him!

scene.meta: Mater drives up the track. McQueen gains, fast. Because Mater's going backwards, they're face-to-face (but still with some distance between them).

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, wait! 113.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Stay back! If you get close to me, you gonna get hurt real bad!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I know I made you feel that way before, but none of that matters because we're best friends! CUT TO:

char.name: TV FOOTAGE OF MCQUEEN CHASING MATER
BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: And McQueen seems to be having a conversation with the tow truck!

char.name: DARRELL CARTRIP (V.O.)
char.dialogue: I don't know who that truck is, Brent. But I'll tell you what, he's gotta be the world's best backwards driver.

scene.meta: REVEAL ZUNDAPP is watching this footage from his luxury box. The closer McQueen gets to Mater the farther his tire ROLLS onto the detonator. But he holds back ever so slightly so as not to jump the gun. ON THE TRACK - McQueen gains on Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: McQueen, you don't get it. I'm the bomb!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Yes, Mater! You are the bomb! That's what I'm trying to say here. You've always been the bomb! And you'll always be the bomb.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Stay away!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: No! Never!

scene.meta: ON ZUNDAPP. He watches as McQueen SPEEDS UP.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Almost there...

scene.meta: ON MCQUEEN. He's had enough screwing around. Here he comes.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I'm not...letting you... 114.

scene.meta: He's going to catch him now.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: ...get away again!

scene.meta: McQueen JUMPS FORWARD, in an attempt to grab Mater's HOOK ---

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Gotta keep away from McQueen.

scene.meta: (TO HIMSELF) McQueen hooks Mater with his bumper JUST AS ---

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Request acknowledged.

scene.meta: TURBINE ROCKETS slide out of Mater.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Oh my gosh!

scene.meta: BAWHOOOOOOM!!!!! Mater JOLTS forward with a rocket blast and disappears, taking McQueen with him. ON ZUNDAPP. He now freely PUSHES the detonator, but it says
Zundapp can't believe it. He FLIPS OUT. FARTHER UP THE TRACK - Francesco speeds along. ZHWAAAAAP!!! Mater and McQueen ZING PAST HIM with a RED BLUR.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: What is happening? It's a bad dream.

scene.meta: NOW EVEN FARTHER UP THE TRACK - Mater takes a turn, SMASHES THROUGH A FENCE and skids around a corner out of sight. A white, smoky JET TRAIL is all that remains. IN MCQUEEN'S PIT - All of Radiator Springs watches the television monitors, dumbfounded.

char.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
char.dialogue: And Lightning McQueen just blasted away, hooked to the now rocket- propelled tow truck. CUT TO:

scene.meta: Overhead P.O.V.: Mater and McQueen swerve through the streets.
The LEMONHEADS watch, baffled, as Zundapp drives away.

char.name: J. CURBY GREMLIN
char.dialogue: The Professor's on the run.

char.name: TUBBS PACER
char.dialogue: Someone's gotta get McQueen.

char.name: VLADIMIR TRUNKOV
char.dialogue: Get McQueen!!

scene.meta: Finn speeds into view, in time to see Zundapp turn a corner out of sight.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Holley. I'll get Zundapp, you help Mater.

scene.meta: Holley, still in the air, turns ---

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Got it!

scene.meta: FARTHER UP THE TRACK - Holley THUNDERS past Francesco and out of sight.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: What is happening?!

scene.meta: Finn screams around a corner, sees --- --- Professor Zundapp, speeding toward docks along the Thames where a COMBAT SHIP waits.

char.name: COMBAT SHIP
char.dialogue: Hurry, Professor!

scene.meta: ON ZUNDAPP - With Finn gaining fast, he accelerates. Suddenly --- WHAP! He's been TETHERED by Finn with tensile cables now attached to his rear end. Zundapp SCREAMS like a little girl.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Do you really think I'm going to let you float away, Professor?

scene.meta: Mater, still towing McQueen, rockets around a corner, zips down another street ---

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: McQueen, let go!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Never!

scene.sceneheader: EXT. DOCKS NEAR THE THAMES - CONTINUOUS
scene.meta: FINN, tires squealing, loses more and more ground to the boat. Zundapp, the "rope" in this tug-of-war, buckles under the tension.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Give it up, McMissile!

scene.meta: Finn releases a mess of bullets, grenades, and other weaponry into the air ---

THE MAGNET SUCKS it in quickly like a black hole --- THUNK! It all sticks to the magnet, right next to Finn's bullets. They're BOMBS, GRENADES, ROCKETS and one little detonator with a flashing, beeping light. Off the boat's RXN --- CUT TO:

char.name: ANOTHER PART OF LONDON, AT STREET LEVEL

scene.meta: KA-BOOOOOOM! A distant explosion (miles away) festoons into the air, visible over the rooftops. Holley suddenly WINGS into view. She sees --- Mater and McQueen, speeding up the street.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Mater, stop!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: No way! You could get hurt!

scene.meta: Then she looks over, catches a glimpse of GREM AND ACER, bearing down on them from a side street. They're going to broadside Mater and McQueen.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Oh no.

scene.meta: ON MATER AND MCQUEEN - They're not aware of the impending impact. Holley DROPS FROM THE SKY, hits the pavement, SKIDS into the path of the AMCs and DEFLECTS THEM. They FLIP OVER Holley, Finn and McQueen and sail --- --- INTO A PUB --- --- where they skid across the room and SLAM into the bar, knocking a ROW OF BEER MUGS to the ground.
Holley, McQueen and Mater are now stopped.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Mater, we've got to get that bomb off you. 118.

scene.meta: She's already SCANNING the bomb, working away.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Bomb?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Yeah, they strapped it to me to kill you as a back-up plan.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Back-up plan? Mater, who put a bomb on you?

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Ahhhhh!

scene.meta: Professor Zundapp suddenly ROLLS to a stop next to (a now totally freaked) McQueen, entangled in grappling hooks care
--- Finn, who has him leashed.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: You. Why didn't my death ray kill you?

scene.meta: (TO MCQUEEN)

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Death ray?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Turn off the bomb, Zundapp!

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Are you all so dense? It's voice- activated. Everything is voice- activated these days.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Deactivate! Deactivate!

char.name: BOMB'S COMPUTER VOICE
char.dialogue: Voice denied.

scene.meta: The BOMB suddenly TRANSFORMS into a TIME BOMB, now complete with a countdown mechanism from 4:59... 4:58... Mater GASPS.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Oops. Did I forget to mention that it can only be disarmed by the one who activated it?

scene.meta: Holley immediately shoves a GUN in Zundapp's grill.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Say it!

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: Deactivate.

char.name: BOMB'S COMPUTER VOICE
char.dialogue: Voice denied.

scene.meta: THE BOMB'S TIMER: It loses a full minute! Goes from 4:48 to 3:48 to 3:47... Mater GASPS.

char.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
char.dialogue: I am not the one who activated it. Would anyone else like to try?

scene.meta: (GRINNING) ZZZZZZATTT! Holley shocks him unconscious.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: You read my mind.

scene.meta: (TO HOLLEY)

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: He was getting on my nerves.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: What do we do?

char.name: VICTOR HUGO (O.S.)
char.dialogue: It's very simple.

scene.meta: VICTOR HUGO blocks the entrance to a side street. He's surrounded by Hugo relatives.

char.name: VICTOR HUGO
char.dialogue: You blow up.

scene.meta: The four streets surrounding them are now blocked by each of the Lemonheads and their families.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I'm gonna go out on a limb here. These are the guys that want me dead, correct?

scene.meta: (TO MATER)

char.name: VLADIMIR TRUNKOV
char.dialogue: It's nothing personal.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Fellers, listen. 120.

scene.meta: (MORE)

char.name: MATER (CONT'D)
char.dialogue: I know what you're going through. Everybody's been laughing at me my whole life too ---

scene.meta: McQueen turns to Mater - he wasn't expecting that. The Lemons all eye each other, considering Mater's words.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: --- but becoming powerful and rich beyond your wildest dreams ain't gonna make you feel better.

char.name: J. CURBY GREMLIN
char.dialogue: Yeah, but it's worth a shot.

scene.meta: WHOOM!!! He's BROADSIDED by a blast of water from O.S. It's Red! He's sitting outside an underground entrance, followed by Sally and the rest of the Radiator Springs gang. ALL OUT WAR ensues between the LEMONS, RADIATOR SPRINGS along with FINN and HOLLEY. FINN attaches his four-way cable hooks to the thugs and springs high in the air, crushing the four of them together. HOLLEY SPROUTS her wings, and knocks out two cars on her side. VARIOUS SHOTS OF RADIATOR SPRINGS KICKING BUTT: Guido pulls some LEMON tires off with his air gun. In seconds he has a stack of lugnuts next to him.

char.name: GUIDO
char.dialogue: Pit stop.

scene.meta: The two Pacers' tires all FALL OFF. Flo hits VLADIMIR TRUNKOV with her high-beams, BLINDING HIM. Sheriff BOOTS him.

char.name: SHERIFF
char.dialogue: Not today, boys!

scene.meta: Guido pushes away his tireless thug, YELLING AT HIM IN
Mater KARATE CHOPS lemons, three and four at a time. Ramone SPRAY PAINTS a lemon's windshield.

char.name: TUBBS PACER
char.dialogue: Retreat!

scene.meta: A few Lemons turn back the way they came. BLOCKING THEIR PATH are a line of BRITISH MILITARY VEHICLES clad in digital camo, led by SARGE.

char.name: SARGE
char.dialogue: Thanks for the help, Corporal.

char.name: BRITISH CORPORAL
char.dialogue: Anything for one of pop's mates.

scene.meta: And in the middle of all of this craziness we CUT TO --- --- MATER. WRENCH BITS are strewn all around him as Guido tries wrench after wrench to take the bolts off. No dice. Guido gestures wildly, spits Italian a mile a minute.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: What's he saying?! What's wrong!?

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: None of his wrenches fit the bolts!

scene.meta: This is a light bulb moment for Mater. He eyes the bolts.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I get it. I get it! I know what needs to be done.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Then do it!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: What? No, I can't do it. Look, nobody takes me seriously. I know that now. This ain't Radiator Springs.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Yes it is.

scene.meta: Mater looks at McQueen. It is?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: You're yourself in Radiator Springs. Be yourself here. And if people aren't taking you seriously, then they need to change. Not you. I know that, because I was wrong before. Now you can do this. You're the bomb. 122.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Thanks, buddy.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: No no no, you're the actual bomb. Now let's go!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Oh, right! Hang on!

scene.meta: Mater HOOKS McQueen and they're off. They SHOOT PAST FINN, who's in the middle of battling lemons.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Where's he going?

scene.meta: ON MATER AND MCQUEEN - Flying down a side street.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Computer!

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Yes, Agent Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I need that thing you done before to get me away from McQueen!

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Request acknowledged.

scene.meta: The ROCKET THRUSTERS kick in. They head right for a WALL.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater...

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Now I need you to do the chute, the second kind not the first!

char.name: MATER'S COMPUTER
char.dialogue: Deploying chute.

scene.meta: The QUEEN, her attendants, assorted dignitaries are here.

char.name: QUEEN
char.dialogue: Who's winning the race?

scene.meta: Mater and McQueen drop from the sky. They land and skid to a halt just before the Queen's guards who DRAW THEIR WEAPONS.

char.name: QUEEN'S GUARD
char.dialogue: Back up! Back away!

char.name: QUEEN
char.dialogue: It's Lightning McQueen!

scene.meta: (STAR-STRUCK)

char.name: QUEEN'S GUARDS
char.dialogue: Get back!

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: No, no, it's okay! Tell them, Mater. Explain.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Okay! Somebody's been sabotaging the racers and hurting the cars and I know who. Oh wait... Your Majesty.

scene.meta: Mater BOWS to the Queen. In doing so, the TICKING TIME BOMB angles into view. The clock's at T-minus 1:53.

char.name: QUEEN'S GUARDS
char.dialogue: - Bomb! - It's a bomb! - Everybody down! - Look out!

char.name: FINN (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Hold your fire! He can't disarm it!

scene.meta: Finn dives onto the platform and rolls between the Queen and Mater.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Mater, I don't know what you're doing but stand down now!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: This ain't nothing at all like Radiator Springs.

scene.meta: (aside, to McQueen)

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, just cut to the chase!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Okay. 124.

scene.meta: He turns to Miles Axlerod.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: It's him.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: What? Me? You've got to be crazy.

scene.meta: Everyone exchanges confused looks, including Finn and Holley.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: I figured it out when I realized you all attached this ticking time bomb with Whitworth bolts. The same bolts that hold together that old British engine from the photograph. Holley! Show that picture.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: O-kay...

scene.meta: Holley projects the much discussed PHOTO OF THE ENGINE.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: And then I remembered what they say about old British engines - "If there ain't no oil under `em, there ain't no oil in `em."

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: What is he talking about?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: It was you leaking oil at the party in Japan. You just blamed it on me.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: Electric cars don't use oil, you twit.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Then you're faking it. You didn't convert to no electric. We pop that hood we gonna see that engine from that picture right there.

scene.meta: Mater moves toward Miles Axlerod to pop his hood.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: This lorry's crazy. He's going to kill us all!

scene.meta: Miles Axlerod BACKS UP to the edge of the stage.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: Stay away!

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: But Sir Axlerod created the race, Mater. Why would he want to hurt anyone?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: To make Allinol look bad so everybody'd go back to using oil. I mean, he said it himself with that disguised voice.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: "Dee-sguised voice?" What are you talking about? You're nuts, you are!

scene.meta: The QUEEN'S GUARDS have had ENOUGH. As has the PRINCE.

char.name: PRINCE WHEELIAM
char.dialogue: This is going nowhere fast. We really should go, Grandmother.

char.name: QUEEN
char.dialogue: One moment. I'd like to see where this is going.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Mater, he created Allinol.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Yeah, but what if he found that huge oil field just as the world was trying to find something else?

scene.meta: Mater sticks his ticking bomb-nose into Miles Axlerod's grill.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: What if he came up with Allinol just to make alternative fuel look bad?

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: "What if?" You're basing this on a "What if"?!

char.name: GUARD
char.dialogue: Okay, that's it.

scene.meta: And the QUEEN'S GUARDS spirit the Queen and Prince Wheeliam out of there FAST ---

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: Wait! Somebody save me! The lorry's crazy!

scene.meta: Now it's just Miles Axlerod, Mater, McQueen, Finn and Holley. Miles Axlerod's back tires slip on the edge of the podium as he is cornered by Mater.

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: Keep away, you idiot!

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Mater!

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Mater!

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: Someone do something!

scene.meta: Everyone FLINCHES, DUCKS or DIVES FOR COVER except McQueen, Mater and Axlerod ---

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: You're insane, you are! Deactivate!!

scene.meta: The bomb FREEZES at 00:01.

char.name: THE BOMB'S COMPUTER VOICE
char.dialogue: Bomb deactivated. Have a nice day, Sir Axlerod.

scene.meta: General shock all around. Miles Axlerod realizes what he's done, looks terrified. Police surround him. Mater FLINGS Miles Axlerod's hood open with his hook, revealing AN INTERNAL COMBUSTION ENGINE, oil dripping from all sides. It MATCHES the photo.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: The engine from the photo.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: It's a perfect match!

char.name: MILES AXLEROD
char.dialogue: How did the tow truck figure it out? 127.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: It's official. You're coming to all my races from now on.

scene.meta: (TO MATER)

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Now you're talking!

scene.meta: Mater does the requisite "silly faces" in an attempt to break the composure of a Buckingham Palace Guard. It isn't working. McQueen approaches.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater, let's go. You're on.

scene.sceneheader: INT. QUEEN'S CHAMBER - BUCKINGHAM PALACE - DAY
scene.meta: The Queen sits in attention at the front of the Main Ballroom. As Mater and McQueen approach:

char.name: LORD STEWARD
char.dialogue: Your Majesty. May I present for the investiture of honorary Knighthood of the British Realm. Tow Mater of Radiator Springs.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Go get `em, buddy.

scene.meta: McQueen joins his friends from Radiator Springs. Mater rolls forward. He bows, as if he's practiced it all day.

char.name: QUEEN
