char.dialogue: I hereby dub thee "Sir Tow Mater."

scene.meta: Applause from all around.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: "Sir?" Shoot, you can just call me Mater, Your Majesty. I don't wanna hear none of this "Sir" business. By the way, have y'all met each other? Queen? McQueen. McQueen, Queen. McQueen? McMissile. 128.

scene.meta: (MORE)

char.name: MATER (CONT'D)
char.dialogue: McMissile, McQueen. Queen? McMissile.

scene.meta: The town sign now reads "WELCOME TO RADIATOR SPRINGS - HOME

char.name: OF LIGHTNING MCQUEEN AND SIR TOW MATER."

scene.meta: Cars surround Mater and McQueen. The rest of the Radiator Springs gang is here too, watches. VAN and MINNY are front and center.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: So there I was: rocket jets going full blast, McQueen hanging on for dear life when suddenly them two nasty lemons come out of nowhere, guns drawed. We was goners. But then out of nowhere, this beautiful spy car swoops in from the sky to save us!

char.name: MINNY
char.dialogue: That's a very entertaining story, young man.

scene.meta: VAN Oh, Minny, please. Come on, none of this happened. Rocket jets? Flying spy cars?

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: No, you're quite right. It does sound a bit far-fetched.

scene.meta: The crowd turns, sees HOLLEY, wings out, swooping in. FINN is right below her, driving up the street.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Holley! Finn!

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Hello, Mater. It's so nice to see you again.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: What're you doing here? 129.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Our satellites picked up an urgent communique.

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: So you got my e-mail.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Oh, man. Y'all is gonna have a great time. Everybody! This here's Finn McMissile. He's a secret agent. Don't tell nobody. And this is Holley Shiftwell. She's ---

scene.meta: (WHISPERS)

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: I'm Mater's girlfriend. It's so nice to meet you all.

scene.meta: Everyone is shocked. Including Mater. Guido's jaw drops.

char.name: LUIGI
char.dialogue: Guido believe you now.

scene.meta: (TO MATER) FLO

char.name: (TO HOLLEY)
char.dialogue: Whoa, honey. You got a nasty dent there.

scene.meta: Indeed, Holley still wears the dent from when she saved Mater from Grem and Acer. VAN (already crushing on her) Was that from when you swooped in and saved them in London?

char.name: MINNY
char.dialogue: Van!

scene.meta: VAN What? I'm just asking. FLO

char.name: (TO HOLLEY)
char.dialogue: Don't you worry, sweet pea. My baby Ramone can get that fixed up for you in no time.

char.name: RAMONE
char.dialogue: Yeah, sure thing. No problemo. Just let me go get my tools. 130.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Oh no no. I'm keeping that dent. It's way too valuable.

scene.meta: Mater takes this in.

char.name: LIZZIE
char.dialogue: A "valuable" dent? Oh, she's as crazy as Mater.

char.name: MACK
char.dialogue: Those two are perfect for each other.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: You know, there's one thing I still don't get. The bad guys hit me with the beam from the camera, right? So why didn't I, you know...

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Explode in a fiery inferno?

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Yeah.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: We couldn't figure that one out either.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Our investigation proved that Allinol was actually gasoline. And Miles Axlerod engineered it so that when it got hit by the beam it would explode.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Wait a second. Fillmore, you said my fuel was safe.

scene.meta: McQueen turns to Fillmore. Everyone does.

char.name: FILLMORE
char.dialogue: If you're implying that I switched out that rotgut excuse for alternative fuel with my all- natural, sustainable, organic biofuel just because I never trusted Axlerod, you're dead wrong, man. It was him. 131.

scene.meta: (RE: SARGE)

char.name: SARGE
char.dialogue: Once Big Oil, always Big Oil. Man.

char.name: FILLMORE
char.dialogue: Tree hugger.

scene.meta: A banner says "Radiator Springs Grand Prix." SHERIFF rolls up the street.

char.name: SHERIFF
char.dialogue: The Radiator Springs Grand Prix is about to begin! All spectators clear the starting line!

scene.meta: MCQUEEN heads up Main Street, other racers following.

char.name: LEWIS HAMILTON
char.dialogue: Man, I can't wait to get rockin'. This is gonna be wicked.

char.name: JEFF GORVETTE
char.dialogue: Yeah, we should do this every year.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I just figured, we never found out who the world's fastest car is. Plus: no press, no trophy. Just racing - the way I like it.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Francesco likes it like this too.

scene.meta: McQueen SEES Sally. He and Francesco approach her.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Francesco. I'd like you to meet ---

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Signorina Sally. It is official: Lightning McQueen is the luckiest car in the world.

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: Why, thank you ---

scene.meta: (SWOONING)

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Which he will have to be to have a chance against Francesco today.

scene.meta: Francesco turns to leave. As he's moving away:

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: See you at the finish line, Mc---

scene.meta: Francesco STOPS.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: What is that?

scene.meta: McQueen has a new bumper sticker: "Ka-ciao, Francesco."

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: It's just something I had made up for the occasion.

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Is good, McQueen. Very funny. It was funnier when I did it, but it's very funny. What are you going to do next? Are you going to take off your fenders? Try it. You'll like it.

scene.meta: Francesco leaves. We stay with McQueen and Sally.

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: So he's not so good-looking.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Yeah. Nice try.

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: I'm serious.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: That's why I love you, Sally. Wish me luck.

scene.meta: (as he leaves)

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: You don't need it!

scene.meta: He drives off. Flo approaches Sally. FLO Mmm-mmm. That Francesco is fine- looking.

char.name: SALLY
char.dialogue: And those open wheels.

scene.meta: FLO I'm gonna have to go get myself some coolant.
As the racers, led by McQueen and Francesco, take the wide, sweeping turn around Willy's Butte we CRANE UP to see MATER, FINN, HOLLEY, and the Radiator Springs gang watching. Everyone CHEERS.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Go McQueen!! Whoo-hoo!!!

scene.meta: Holley gets an alert.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Finn, time to go. Siddeley's gassed, geared and ready to fly.

scene.meta: Finn starts to back up.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: You're leaving already?

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: We've got another mission, Mater. Just stopped by here to "pick something up."

scene.meta: They both eye Mater, expectantly.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Something tells me you're not talking about souvenir bumper stickers.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Her Majesty asked for you personally, Mater.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: But I told you all before. I'm not a spy.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: We know. 134.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: Spy or not, you're still the smartest, most honest chap we've ever met.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: Don't forget massively charming.

scene.meta: Mater looks over at Holley. He looks touched.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, thanks. But as much fun as it was hanging with y'all, this...

scene.meta: He looks over to his friends who watch the race, CHEER

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: This is home.

char.name: HOLLEY
char.dialogue: That's alright, we understand. But I'll be back. You still owe me that first date.

char.name: FINN
char.dialogue: If there's ever anything I can do for you, just let me know.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Well, I sure appreciate that, thank you. Actually... there is one thing. CUT TO:

scene.meta: MATER, blazing forward fast.

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Whoo-hoo!!!

scene.meta: He ROCKETS FORWARD, through the whole town. In doing so he GRABS A BROKEN DOWN OTIS, hooking him ---

char.name: OTIS
char.dialogue: Whoa!!!

scene.meta: --- and TOSSING him right into Ramone's.

char.name: OTIS (O.S.)
char.dialogue: Thanks, Mater! 135.

scene.meta: ON THE "RACE TRACK" - Mater flies past ALL the racers, including Francesco ---

char.name: FRANCESCO
char.dialogue: Impossible!

scene.meta: --- until he approaches MCQUEEN.

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: Mater!?

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Check it out. They let me keep the rockets!

scene.meta: (KEEPING PACE)

char.name: MCQUEEN
char.dialogue: I'll see you at the finish line, buddy!

char.name: MATER
char.dialogue: Not if I see you first!

scene.meta: McQueen and Mater peel away from the rest of the racers, lead them off the road and into the dirt for another lap. The two friends are side by side when we FADE OUT.
